The Stargate currently has lost power and needs to be started again.

english: Captain, this sector has never been visited before and it is outside of my security jurisdiction.
translation: jan lawa o, jan ala li tawa kipisi ma mun ni lon tenpo pini. ona li weka tan ma pi lawa mi.

english: We have a full scan underway for the sector, once it's completed more locations will be marked on your map. In the systems surveyed so far we've found new resources, which may be just a glimpse into what this sector has to offer.
translation: tenpo ni la mi alasa e ma kipisi mun ni. pini alasa la ma sin li sitelen lon sitelen ma sina. sona ma sin pi tenpo ni la mi sona e ijo pona mani sin. ken la pona mute li lon.

english: Unfortunately, that means pirates will probably find their way here soon, but it seems clear for now.
translation: ike la, ni la jan ike lanpan li kama lon tenpo kama poka. taso ona li lon ala lon tenpo ni.

english: Severe weather has also been detected nearby.
translation: kin la mi lukin e tawa kon ike lon poka.

english: Who knows what you may find out here. Be careful, Captain.
translation: jan ala li sona e ni: sina kama lukin e seme tan alasa pi ma sin ni. o tawa pi awen pona, jan lawa o.

english: Captain, our sector scan has found new systems in the sector.
translation: jan lawa o, alasa lukin li pana e sona pi ma sin lon kipisi ma mun ni.

english: Be prepared for combat if you're going to visit. Good luck, Captain.
translation: sina kama la o ken utala. o alasa pona, jan lawa o.

english: Thank you, Captain! We would never have survived without your assistance.
translation: jan lawa o sina pona a! pona sina ala la mi awen ala.

english: If you'd be interested, we'd be honoured to join forces with your fleet.
translation: sina wile la, mi wile pona kulupu kepeken sina.

english: Investigate a distress call in system S*X.
translation: o alasa e toki pi wile pona lon kulupu sike S*X.
jan lawa o wile e pona

english: There is a crisis underway, Captain.  Commercial vessels are going missing, all across the sector.  I suspect foul play, and I need your help to investigate.
translation: jan lawa o, pakala li lon. ilo tawa esun mute li tawa weka lon kipisi ma mun ni. pilin mi la, ni li tan pali pi jan ike. o pona e lukin mi.

english: I've marked the location of the shipwreck on your map as a Gold Highlight.  Good luck, Captain.
translation: mi suno jelo e pakala lon sitelen ma mun sina. o alasa pona.

english: Complete any story episode in 'Boldly Go' to unlock
translation: wile open la o pini e kipisi toki pi nasin 'O TAWA PONA'

english: Due to new phases or storylines surrounding the stargate, your stargate progress has been reset.
translation: tenpo toki sin anu nasin toki sin pi lupa mun la, pali sina pi lupa mun li tawa weka.

english: Add scaffolding to support equipment on the exterior of your ship
translation: wile kepeken ilo pi insa tomo ala la o pali e palisa sijelo ilo

english: Unlocks Phases 4 and 5 of the Andromeda Project.
translation: pali suli Antometa la, kipisi nanpa tu tu en kipsi nanpa luka la, ni li open e nasin pali.

english: The damaged ship is nearby in system S*X. Hurry!
translation: ilo tawa pakala li lon kulupu sike mun S*X. ni li poka la o tawa wawa a!

english: The hostile ships are located at system S*X.
translation: ilo tawa ike li lon kulupu sike S*X.

english: Luckily there is just such an asteroid belt nearby, within this sector, in system S*X.
translation: pona la, kulupu kiwen mun Silija li lon poka lon kipisi ma ni, lon kulupu sike S*X.

english: You have destroyed the enemy forces in system S*X. Payment of $*Y is coming your way.
translation: sina moli e jan ike lon ma S*X. mani $*Y li kama.

english: Investigate a distress call in system S*X.
translation: o alasa e toki pi wile pona lon ma S*X.

english: The ship's main source of forward thrust.  Must be supplied with Fuel (via a pipe) and Power (via a cable).
translation: ni li tawa sinpin e ilo tawa, li wile e telo wawa (kepeken nasin lupa) e wawa (kepeken linja wawa).

english: Engines for propulsion.  Test fire your engines (From the TACTICAL view) to certify them.
translation: ilo pi wawa tawa li tawa e ilo tawa.  o kepeken pi tenpo nanpa wan e ilo pi wawa tawa (lon sitelen pi NASIN UTALA).  ni li pana e sona ni: ona li ken.

english: Excellent. We are sending a shuttle to you now.
translation: pona mute. mi pana e ilo tawa lili tawa sina lon tenpo ni.

english: Captain, the Stargate is ready for its first test. If supplied with enough power it should provide us access to a nearby uncharted sector.
translation: jan lawa o, sina ken kepeken nanpa wan e lupa mun. jo pi mute wawa pona la, ona li pana e nasin tawa ma mun sin poka.

english:
Let's turn our attention to the STARGATE PROJECT.

We can view our progress from the Stargate screen.

Open the STARGATE screen.
translation:
o lukin e PALI SULI PI LUPA MUN.

sina ken lukin e mute pini pi pali ni kepeken lipu pi lupa mun.

o open e lipu pi LUPA MUN.

english: Click on the nearby RUINED EQUIPMENT to instruct your crew to dismantle it into SCRAP METAL.
translation: o luka e ILO PAKALA. ni li toki e ni tawa jan sina: o pakala e ni tawa KIWEN SUNO PAKALA.

english: The ship is fitted with engines and an FTL drive for Interstellar Travel! But it does need a crew.\n\nOpen the TRADE screen.
translation: ilo tawa ni li jo e ilo pi wawa tawa e ilo pi tawa suli! taso ona li wile e jan.\n\no open e LIPU ESUN.

english: Many different types of contract are now available to you.\n\nHowever, you must stay alert, Captain. There are reports of even more lucrative opportunities that you'll have to find by yourself.
translation: pali esun pi nasin mute li ken\n\ntaso o lukin pona lon tenpo ale. toki la alasa li ken pana e pali esun pi mani mute.

english: We are now going to learn some basic combat techniques.
translation: tenpo ni la o kama sona e nasin utala open.

english: Well done, you have produced Tilium Cystals.
translation: sina pona. sina pali e KIWEN MANI SILIJA

english: They're sending the recovered wreckage to your ship The L*X now, Captain. It will arrive soon by Shuttle. You'll need to store it somewhere onboard.
translation: jan lawa o, ona li pana e pakala tawa tomo tawa L*X sina lon tenpo ni. ona li kama lon tomo tawa lili. sina wile awen e ona lon insa pi tomo tawa sina.

english: Standby while I dock my ship with yours, Captain, to collect the items you've recovered so far. Thank you for your efforts.
translation: o awen la mi poka lupa e tomo tawa mi tawa sina, jan lawa o. mi kama jo e ijo tan alasa sina. sina pona tan pali alasa.

english: We need to find a way to track them down, and destroy them.  We will be in touch soon, Captain.
translation: mi wile alasa e ona. mi wile moli e ona.  mi toki lon tenpo kama poka, jan lawa o.

english: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing, Part 2
translation: soweli utala li len sama soweli moku la, kipisi nanpa 2
jan lawa o sina pona tan kama.

english: The Reactor is reaching critical levels, Captain.  I can't stop it from overloading.
translation: jan lawa o, ilo wawa li kama pakala. mi ken ala weka e kama pi pakala seli.

english: Well done, Captain.  Your intervention prevented a further loss of life.  And now we know the pirate vessel is crewed by cowards, a fact that we intend to use to our advantage.
translation: jan lawa o sina pali pona.  pali sina li weka e kama moli.  tenpo ni la mi sona e ni: jan ike lanpan li pilin monsuta.  mi ken kepeken pona e sona ni.

english: I appreciate your speed in rescuing the crew of the Orion Sentinel, Captain.
translation: jan lawa o, sina kama pona e jan tan tomo tawa Orion Sentinel.  sina pona tan tenpo lili pi pali ni.

english: Thank you, Captain.  Protect your fleet, and wait for our call.
translation: jan lawa o, sina pona.  o awen e kulupu sina.  o awen tan toki mi lon tenpo kama.

english: For years now my brother and I have been studying the high energy particle emissions in orbit of the black hole you can see behind us.  Its official designation is Qz247 - the collapsed remnants of a star that lived a couple of billion years ago.
translation: tenpo mute pi sike suno la mi en jan sama mi li pali sona e tawa wawa pi ilo lili lon sike selo pi lupa pimeja ni.  sina ken lukin e lupa lon monsi mi.  nimi ona li lupa pimeja Qz247.  ona li kama tan pakala suno lon tenpo pi pini mute.

english: Thank you for offering your services, Captain.
translation: sina pona tan wile pali pona, jan lawa o

english: I'm sending a shuttle to you now, Captain. Get your crew to load the Hyperspace Isotopes for me.
translation: mi pana e tomo tawa lili tawa sina lon tenpo ni, jan lawa o.  jan pali sina o tawa e lili.

english: Thank you, Captain. I now have what I need to modify this FTL drive for the Short Range Hop.
translation: sina pona, jan lawa o.  tenpo ni la mi wile ante pi tawa lili e ilo ni pi tawa suli.

english: It looks like you have enough Tilium Crystals.  Bring the Tilium Crystals back to me to close the contract.
translation: lukin la sina jo e kiwen mani Silija pi mute pona.  o kama e kiwen tawa mi la pali esun li pini.

english: I'll send the shuttle to collect the Tilium Crystals. Thank you, Captain!
translation: mi pana e tomo tawa lili.  ona li kama e kiwen mani Silija tawa mi.  jan lawa o sina pona!

english: Excellent work, Captain.  I'll begin synthesising the FTL charges immediately.  It will take me a little while.
translation: pali pi pona mute, jan lawa o.  tenpo ni la mi open pali e wawa pi tawa suli lili.

english: Greetings, Captain.  I'm a representative of the Stargate Project.
translation: jan lawa o, toki.  mi jan tan kulupu pali pi lupa mun.

english: When the accident occurred, the younger twin Marcus was collecting vital data on black hole Qz247.  Data that is simply impossible to acquire by any other means.  Data that we need to complete the Stargate.
translation: tenpo pakala la jan Makumasine li alasa e sona suli tan lupa pimeja Qz247.  mi ken ala kama jo e sona ni kepeken nasin ante.  pini pali pi lupa mun li wile e sona ni.

english: Everything is ready, Captain.  I've produced the Hyperspace Modulators and the FTL fuel is already loaded.
translation: jan lawa o, pali li ken open.  pini la mi pali e kipisi ilo nasa pi kama ante.  wawa pi tawa suli lili li lon tomo wile lon tenpo ni.

english: This has been a long time coming, Captain.  I've been working on this rescue for years.  Time dilation effects from the Black Hole mean that only a few hours will have passed for my brother.  It will be a surprise to him just how much time has passed when you bring him out.
translation: pona ni li kama tan tenpo suli, jan lawa o. mi lukin kama pona e jan sama mi lon tenpo mute pi sike suno.  nasa tenpo pi lupa pimeja la tenpo lili taso li weka tawa jan sama.  ona li kama weka tan lupa la ni li kama pilin nasa tawa ona: tenpo mute li weka.

english: Let's run over the plan one last time.  You're going to perform an incredibly short range Hyperspace Hop, and you'll emerge directly on top of my brother's ship.  Dock with his ship, rescue him and then get out of there.  Hop in, Rescue, Hop out.
translation: mi o toki lon pali kama lon tenpo wan namako.  sina kama tawa suli pi lili lili.  ni la sina lon poka tomo tawa pi jan sama mi.  o poka lupa e ona o kama pona e jan o tawa weka.  tawa kama en kama pona jan en tawa weka.

english: Good luck, Captain. I'll see you on the other side.
translation: o pona, jan lawa o.  mi lukin e sina lon pini.

english: Greetings, Captain.  Good luck with the rescue.  Remember the data onboard Marcus' ship is extremely valuable to us.  You'll need Marcus to transmit the data from his console before you can complete the rescue.
translation: jan lawa o, toki.  kama pona jan la o pona.  o sona e ni: sona lon tomo tawa pi jan Makumasine li suli tawa mi mute.  kama pona jan li pini ala la tenpo ni la jan Makumasine li wile pana e sona tan ilo lon tomo tawa ona.

english: Dock your ship with mine, Captain, and tell me when you're ready for me to come on board.  Please hurry!
translation: o poka lupa e tomo tawa sina tawa tomo tawa mi, jan lawa o.  mi ken kama tawa tomo sina la tenpo ni la o toki.  o tawa wawa!

english: The Stargate data?  I can send that, Captain, but you'll have to give me a few minutes to access the data and set up the transmission.
translation: sona pi lupa mun, anu seme?  mi ken pana e ona, jan lawa o.  taso pali pi pana sona toki li wile e tenpo lili.

english: My ship is falling apart from the gravitional forces, Captain.  I've sent the data that I can.  Please hurry and get me off this ship!
translation: tomo tawa mi li kama pakala lon tenpo ni, jan lawa o.  tenpo pini la mi pana e sona ale pi ken mi.  pona la o kama pona e mi tan tomo pakala lon tenpo ni!

english: The reactor containment has failed, Captain.  The cabin is being flooded with radiation.  You have to get me out of here!
translation: selo pi ilo wawa li pakala, jan lawa o.  wawa ike kon li kama tawa tomo.  o kama a e mi tan tomo ni!

english: I'm onboard, Captain.  Get us out of here!
translation: mi lon tomo sina, jan lawa o.  o tawa weka e mi mute a!

english: Thank you so much, Captain. I couldn't have succeeded without your help. I'm so grateful you took my call and were here for us when we needed you.
translation: sina pona mute, jan lawa o.  pona sina ala la mi ken ala pini pona.  mi pilin pona mute tan ni: mi toki pi wile pona la, sina kama.

english: We're really disappointed in your choices, Captain.  You've let us down and you've let the whole Stargate Project down, with your incredibly narrow thinking.
translation: sina pali ike, jan lawa o.  sina pakala tawa jan pali ale pi lupa mun.  lawa sina li ike.

english: Well done on retrieving some of the data, Captain.  We would have preferred all of it, but we appreciate the rescue was under extreme duress.
translation: kama jo sona meso la sina pona, jan lawa o.  tenpo pini la mi wile e sona pi mute suli la, sona pi mute meso li pona tan tenpo pi pakala suli.

english: Congratulations, Captain, on successfully recovering the science data from the stricken vessel.  This data represents a huge step forward in our understanding of high energy physics, and will hugely accelerate the Stargate Program.
translation: jan lawa o, sina pona tan ni: sina kama e sona mute tan ilo tawa pakala.  sona ni li pona mute e sona pi wawa nasa.  ni li pona mute e pali pi lupa mun.

english: Congratulations, Captain. Your performance in the destruction of the Pirate Vessel exceeded all expectations!
translation: sina pona, jan lawa o.  moli pi jan ike lanpan la pali sina li pona wawa!

english: Farewell, Captain. Your dedication to justice and the safety of our sector will be remembered.
translation: jan lawa o tawa pona.  tenpo kama ale la mi sona e ni: sina pana e pona awen mute tawa kipisi ma mun ni.

english: Are you kidding me! They've... They've reproduced! We've just witnessed an interstellar life form, spontaneously reproducing!
translation: nasa a! ona... ona li pana mama! mi lukin e ni: soweli mun li pana mama!

english: Incredible work, Captain. I can't believe how much we've seen, in such a short period of time.
translation: pona mute, jan lawa o.  sona sin nasa mute li kama tan tenpo lili.

english: These findings will make an incredible research paper, Captain.  I'll be sure to credit you as the pilot who found the first living specimens.  I would offer to name the creatures after you, but they already have a name, so apologies for not being able to honour that tradition.
translation: sona sin ni la mi sitelen a lipu sona pi pona mute, jan lawa o.  mi sitelen e ni: sina jan nanpa wan pi ilo tawa li alasa pona e soweli Sipa nanpa wan pi moli ala.  soweli li jo ala nimi la sina ken pana e nimi.  nimi Sipa li lon la, ike la mi ken ala.

english: Anyway, thank you for your work, Captain. Here's a reward for your efforts.
translation: sina pona tan pali, jan lawa o.  mi pana e pona ni tawa sina.

english: Welcome back, Captain! I must say, the corridors at the Institute have been alive with excitement over this wondrous new lifeform. My paper has already been provisionally accepted into all the top nature journals, which makes me so proud.
translation: kama sin pona, jan lawa o! mi pilin e ni: pilin pi tomo sona li wawa pona tan sona pi soweli mun nasa sin ni.  lipu sona mi li tawa jan sona mute la mi pilin pona.

english: We need you to take the tiddlets on a series of specific hyperspace jumps. We will be recording the effect on their reproductive process and on their physiology. All... well, most of these experiments can be done hopefully without any harm coming to the creatures.
translation: mi wile e ni: mi pana e kulupu pi nasin mun tawa sina. sina tawa suli lon nasin ni. mi lukin e ni: seme li kama lon nasin unpa soweli lon sijelo soweli?  ale... n, mute la kama sona li pakala ala e soweli.

english: But with your permission, we can begin. Install the new sensors first, Captain. And be sure to stock up on FTL fuel if you need to. Three or four jumps ought to be enough.
translation: taso sina wile la, mi ken open. open la o pana e ilo lukin sin tawa tomo sina, jan lawa o. o pona: mute pona la o jo e wawa pi tawa suli.  nasin li tawa suli tu wan anu tu tu.

english: *X Tiddlets so far.  This is all working very well, Captain.  Now onto the real science.
translation: tenpo ni la soweli Sipa *X.  nasin li pona, jan lawa o.

english: *X Tiddlets now on board!  Fascinating, Captain.  It appears the Tiddlet reproductive process occurs even at incredibly short hyperspace distances.\nHow do they find the time?
translation: soweli Sipa *X li lon tomo!  nasa pona, jan lawa o.  lukin la nasin unpa Sipa li kama kin lon tawa suli pi lili mute.\nona li jo e tenpo unpa tan seme?

english: That's such a horrible thing to witness.\nWe can't allow this sort of experiment to be done again, doctor. It's so unethical.
translation: lukin ike a.\npali sona ni li ken ala lon tenpo kama, jan sona o. ni li nasin ike.

english: There's something else.  There's a reading showing up on the sensors, deep inside the core of the dead tiddlets.\nBring them all back to me, Captain. I think we've done enough for today.
translation: kin.  ilo lukin li lukin e ijo lon insa pi soweli Sipa moli.\no kama e ona ale tawa mi, jan lawa o. mi pilin e ni: mi pali pi pona mute lon tenpo suno no.
sina pona, jan lawa o!

english: The work continues, Captain. There is so much more to these Tiddlets than we realised.
translation: pali sona li awen, jan lawa o. soweli Sipa li len e sona mute.

english: I don't think I had the chance to properly thank you, Captain. You risked your life for us.  And now my twin is ten years older than me! It's taken some getting used to.
translation: pilin mi la mi weka toki e ijo suli ni: sina pona mute, jan lawa o.  wile pona mi la sina tawa lon nasin pi ken moli.  tenpo ni la jan sama mi li jo e tenpo 10 namako pi sike suno tawa mi!  ona li nasa.

english: I've put the rescue ship up for sale. I was asking $1M, but you can have it for half that price if you like.  Thank you, Captain.  You'll always be welcome with us.
translation: mi esun e ilo tawa pi kama pona jan.  mi wile e mani $1M la, sina wile la mi ken tu e mani.  sina pona, jan lawa o.  kama sina li pona tawa mi lon tenpo ale.

english: Incredible work, Captain. I'm not sure how you managed that, but I'm true to my word.  I'll wire the funds to Dr. Martinez, with a sales bonus of $100k for you.  Bring the ship back to the Institute, and let's put it to use.
translation: pali pi pona wawa, jan lawa o.  mi sona ala e nasin sina la mi pana sama toki mi.  mi pana e mani tawa jan sona Julijanmasine.  mi pana e mani namako $100k tawa sina.  o kama e ilo tawa tawa tomo sona.  mi o kepeken ona.

english: Hello, Captain.  How have you been? Things have been tough here.
translation: jan lawa o, toki.  sina pona ala pona?  ike li lon ma ni.

english: I hope it was worth it for you, Captain.
translation: mi wile e ni: pona mute sina li kama tan pakala ni, jan lawa o.

english: Good work, Captain. That's a good price.  I'll send the funds to Dr Martinez.  You've earned a sales bonus of $40k.  Bring the ship back to the Institute, and let's put it to use.
translation: pali pona, jan lawa o.  mani esun li lili pona.  mi pana e mani tawa jan sona Julijanmasine.  sina kama jo e mani namako $40k.  o kama e ilo tawa tawa tomo sona la mi kepeken.

english: I don't want to talk to you, Captain.  Yes, the ship is for sale.  Take it.  I don't ever want to see that ship, or you, again.  Do not call me again.
translation: mi wile ala toki tawa sina, jan lawa o. lon la, mi esun e ilo tawa.  o esun e ona.  mi wile ala a lukin e sina e ilo ni lon tenpo kama ale.  o toki ala tawa mi.

english: Excellent.  It's working, as I knew it would.  Give us three more hops, Captain.
translation: pona mute.  pona li kama sama toki mi.  o tawa lon tenpo tu wan kin, jan lawa o.

english: Dismantle the Hop Drive, Captain, and I'll send a shuttle to collect it.  I want you to replace the Hop Drive with a conventional FTL drive, for the final part of the experiment.  I'll send a replacement FTL drive in the delivery shuttle.
translation: jan lawa o tu e ilo pi tawa suli lili.  mi kama e ona tawa mi kepeken tomo tawa lili.  tu pini pin pali sona la mi wile e ni: sina weka e ilo pi tawa suli lili, li kepeken ilo pi tawa suli nasin.  mi pana e ilo nasin lon tomo tawa lili sama.

english: You know what to do, Captain.  A couple of very long jumps ought to be enough.  Bring them all back to me when it's done.
translation: sina sona e nasin pona, jan lawa o.  tawa suli suli tu li ken pona.  pini la o kama e ale tawa mi.

english: Well done, Captain.  Everything has worked exactly as I predicted, and we now have an excellent harvest on the farm ship.  More importantly, you've shown the way.
translation: pali pona, jan lawa o.  ale li kama sama toki mi.  tenpo ni la mi jo e pona mute lon tomo mama Sipa.  suli ale la sina pana suno e nasin.

english: I think I can take it from here, Captain.  My engineers tell me they'll have the Hop Drive fitted to the farm ship in just a few days.  In fact, we are close to automating the entire Tiddlet Harvest process with this one ship.
translation: mi pilin e ni: mi ken pini e pali lon tenpo ni, jan lawa o.  jan pali mi li toki e ni tawa mi: tenpo kama poka la ona li pini pana e ilo pi tawa suli lili lon tomo mama Sipa.  ni li wile taso e tenpo suno pi nanpa lili.  lon la, poka la mi lawa ilo e nasin mama Sipa ale kepeken ilo tawa wan taso.

english: I knew we could rely on you, Captain.  Thank you for showing the highest degrees of professionalism.
translation: sina pali pona, jan lawa o.  sina jan pali pi nasin pona nanpa wan.

english: Mark my words, Captain.  You will bitterly regret crossing me.
translation: o kute pona e toki me, jan lawa o.  sina kama pilin ike tan ni: sina pakala e mi.

english: I'll be in touch if I need your help, Captain.
translation: wile pona sin la mi toki lon tenpo kama, jan lawa o.

english: You have to help us, Captain.
translation: o pona e mi, jan lawa o.

english: Oh god... they're in the food stuffs!
translation: sewi a... ona li lon poki moku!

english: Oh god... they're in the air-conditioning system!
translation: sewi a... ona li lon nasin lupa pi kon pona!

english: Oh god... they're in the reactor room!
translation: sewi a... ona li lon tomo pi ilo wawa!

english: I want to thank you for helping, Captain, when it counted. For doing the right thing. I'll split the remaining grant money I have with you. You deserve it.
translation: sina pona, jan lawa o.  sina pali pona lon tenpo suli.  pona sina la mi tu e mani li pana e kipisi tawa sina.  o jo.

english: But I'd recommend you never bring a third aboard.  Look after them, Captain. I know you will.
translation: taso o kama ala e soweli Sipa nanpa tu wan tawa tomo sina.  o pona e ona, jan lawa o.  mi sona e ni: sina kama pona e ona.

english: I suggest you look after them from now on, Captain. It won't atone for the things you've done, but it's a start.
translation: o awen pona e soweli tan tenpo ni tawa tenpi kama, jan lawa o.  ni li pona ala e pali ike pi tenpo pini la, ona li open pona taso.

english: I suspect foul play here, Captain. There's no way a ship like the Celestial Hammer would just vanish. Something must have happened, and I'm assuming the worst.
translation: mi pilin e ni: jan li pali e ike lon ni, jan lawa o.  nasin ala la ilo tawa Celestial Hammer li tawa weka tan ala.  ike li kama.  pilin mi la, ike suli.

english: I have to know what happened, Captain.
translation: mi wile sona e nasin pakala, jan lawa o.

english: Right-clicking on equipment allows you to set recipes. Set the smelter recipe to scrap metal.
translation: sina luka ante e ilo la sina ken lawa e nasin pali.  o lawa e nasin pali ni tawa ilo kiwen seli: kiwen suno pakala.

english: Thank you, Captain.  I appreciate the prompt payment.
translation: sina pona, jan lawa o.  kama mani pi tenpo lili li pona tawa mi.
kama mani li pini pona.  sina pona, jan lawa o.

english: I've received my share.  Excellent work, Captain.
translation: mi jo e kipisi mani mi.  pali pona, jan lawa o.

english: Batches of completed parts may now be submitted to the Andromeda Project through the open Marketplace. You will find our buyers ready to release funds for any parts manufactured to specification.
translation: sina ken pana e kulupu pi ijo tawa kulupu Antometa kepeken tomo esun.  jan esun li wile pana e mani tan ijo wile pini pona ale.

english: Fantastic work, Captain.  I had high expectations, but the process was even more smooth than I hoped.  We've made ourselves known to the Andromeda Project now, but this is just the beginning.
translation: pali pona, jan lawa o.  mi pilin pona la nasin li pona mute.  kulupu Antometa li sona e mi lon tenpo ni.  taso ni li tenpo open taso.

english: Welcome back, Captain.  I've been taking a look at the schematics published by the Andromeda Project, and the next phase is going to need a huge upgrade to our facilities.
translation: kama sin pona, jan lawa o.  mi lukin e sitelen Antometa pi nasin pali.  tenpo kama li wile e kama suli wawa lon tomo pali.

english: The first part is a Stargate Actuator.  This is something we can manufacture in our existing factory station, although it's a more complex production chain.  There won't be nearly enough resources available in the Marketplace, so we'll have to mine the local belt for minerals.
translation: nanpa wan li ilo open pi lupa mun.  mi ken pali e ni kepeken kulupu ilo lon.  taso nasin li ike mute.  esun li jo ala e ijo mute la mi wile alasa kiwen lon kulupu kiwen mun poka.

english: One last thing, Captain.  I'm sure you've noticed, we aren't exactly surrounded by asteroids here.  I suggest you pair the station up with one of your FTL capable vessels, and jump them both to a suitable mining location.  You can leave the station there to do its work.
translation: ijo pini wan taso, jan lawa o.  ken la sina sona tan lukin: kiwen mun li weka mute lon poka.  mi pilin e ni: o kulupu e tomo pali e ilo tawa pi tawa suli.  o tawa suli e kulupu tawa ma pona pi alasa kiwen.  o awen e tomo pali lon ma ni tan pali ona.

english: Time is now of the essence, Captain.  All three parts need to be produced, and I'm in more of a hurry than you may realise.  Keep me informed!
translation: pona tenpo li suli, jan lawa o.  ijo wile tu wan ale li wile pali.  sina sona ala sona la mi jo ala e tenpo mute.  o pana e sona tawa mi lon nasin pali!

english: You'll need all of that equipment to get started.  I'd recommend Collectors, Refineries, and Chemical Labs, four each at least.  You'll also want Storage Tanks to buffer the intermediate products, and an upgrade to the Power Grid.
translation: wile open pali la sina wile e ilo ni ale.  mi pilin e ni: tu tu anu mute la o jo e ilo alasa kon, e ilo pi pali pona, e supa pali pi sona seli.  kin la o jo e poki lon nasin, e kama suli pi pana wawa.

english: The final stage is to install a Loader or two, and set them to 'UNLOAD'.  This will instruct your crew to barrel up the stable isotopes and store them in the cargo hold so you can easily sell them on the Marketplace.
translation: nasin pali la pini li ni: wan anu tu la o pana e ilo tawa moku wawa.  o lawa e ilo tawa nasin 'WEKA'.  ni la jan li poki e kiwen awen pi tawa suli.  jan li pana e poki tawa ma awen lon tomo jo.  ni la sina ken esun e ona lon tomo esun.

english: Excellent work, Captain.  On time and to specification, as usual.  The Andromeda Project have enough of that item now, so you may as well stop production and save the energy and materials.
translation: pali pona, jan lawa o.  pona tenpo en pona pi nasin pali.  kulupu Antometa li jo e mute pona pi ijo ni lon tenpo ni la, o pini e pali ni.  sina wile ala weka ike e wawa e ijo.

english: We are all done, Captain.  That was an incredible display of industrialised power.  There's nobody even close to us in the Marketplace, and we basically are the Andromeda Project.  They need us now.
translation: pini, jan lawa o.  sina pana lukin e pali wawa.  jan pali ala li lon poka lon esun ale.  suli la kulupu pali Antometa li kulupu mi.  ona li wile e mi lon tenpo ni.

english: You should know that my Doctors continue to bring me bad news.  Each time I talk to them... well, I don't know how long I have left.  This will be my final project.  I just hope I have time to finish it.
translation: o sona e ni: awen la jan misikeke li toki e pakala sijelo kama tawa mi.  ni li pali pini mi.  mi wile taso e ni: mi jo e tenpo pi ken pini.

english: We've recieved reports of a shipwreck nearby. I believe it to be the wreckage of THE INTERSTELLAR PROSPECTOR - a large commercial vessel that went missing yesterday.

english: It is the 23rd century.  Humanity has colonised the stars.
translation: ni li kulupu 23 pi sike suno.  jan li tawa ma mun li awen lon poka pi suno ante.

english: Millions of people now live off world, sometimes hundreds of light years from Earth.
translation: jan mute li lon ma sike ante. mute li weka mute tan ma sike open.

english: The era of massive industrialisation of space has begun, feeding an insatiable desire for energy and metal.
translation: tenpo ni la pali suli mun li open. pali li wile wawa e wawa e kiwen suno.

english: Powerful businesses control vast swathes of space, backed by untold reserves of wealth.
translation: kulupu esun wawa li wawa e kipisi suli pi ma mun. ona li jo e mani pi mute wawa.

english: The CEO of one such company - the INTERSTELLAR MINING CORPORATION - has challenged humanity to build a stargate so powerful it can reach our nearest Galaxy.
translation: wan li KULUPU INTERSTELLAR PI ALASA KIWEN. jan lawa ona li toki e ni tawa jan ale: o pali e lupa mun. lupa ni la jan li ken tawa kulupu suli ante pi suno mun.

english: Trillions of dollars in funding have been set aside.
translation: mani mute mute li tawa ni.

english: The time is perfect for a small entrepreneurial and industrious team of miners to start a new career - and make their fortune in the stars.
translation: kulupu sin pi jan pali la ni li tenpo pona. sina ken kama e mani mute tan suno.

english:
This vessel is fresh out of the shipyard production line.

It's just an empty hull right now, without power or a breathable atmosphere. Our first job is to fix that.

Click NEXT to continue.
translation:
tomo tawa ni li kama sin tan tomo pali.

tenpo ni la ona li selo weka taso, li jo ala e wawa e kon. suli nanpa wan li ni: o pona e ni.

wile open la o luka e nena PONA.
LAWA LUKIN
PANA PI ILO WAWA
ILO WAWA LI LON

english: Let's begin by installing a REACTOR, to generate power for our ship.\n\nClick into the CONSTRUCTION menu, then click INSTALL.
translation: open la o pana e ILO WAWA. ni li pana e wawa\n\no luka e lipu PALI la o luka e nena O PANA E ILO.

english: This is all the boxed equipment you have available on-board.\n\nSelect REACTOR from the list.
translation: ni li ilo poki ale lon tomo.\n\no wile e ILO WAWA tan kulupu nimi.

english: Stamp the REACTOR down inside your ship.
translation: o pana e ILO WAWA lon supa neko pi tomo tawa sina.

english: Your crew will install the REACTOR.
translation: jan sina li tawa e ILO WAWA tawa ma wile.

english: The REACTOR needs FUEL, and we use a FUEL LOADER to pump it to the REACTOR.\n\nSelect the FUEL LOADER from the Construction menu.
translation: ILO WAWA li wile e TELO WAWA. ILO TAWA TELO WAWA li tawa e telo tawa ILO WAWA.\n\no wile e ILO TAWA TELO WAWA tan lipu pali.

english: Stamp the FUEL LOADER down somewhere near the REACTOR.
translation: o pana e ILO TAWA TELO WAWA lon poka pi ILO WAWA.

english: We need to connect the FUEL LOADER to the REACTOR, using a Pipe.\n\nSelect PIPES from the Construction Menu.
translation: sina wile wan e ILO TAWA TELO WAWA e ILO WAWA kepeken nasin lupa.\n\no wile e NASIN LUPA tan lipu pali.

english:
Drag a pipe from the FUEL LOADER to the REACTOR, connecting the yellow pipe circles.

FUEL PIPES are used to connect the output from one piece of equipment into the input of another.

FUEL PIPES are yellow and must connect the yellow circles on equipment.
translation:
o sitelen e nasin lupa tan ILO TAWA TELO WAWA tawa ILO WAWA. o wan e sike jelo.

NASIN LUPA PI TELO WAWA li wan e lupa weka pi ilo wan e lupa kama pi ilo ante.

NASIN LUPA li jelo li wile luka e sike jelo lon ilo.
ILO TAWA li open pali.
KON PONA

english: We now need to provide a breathable atmosphere for our crew. This is done with an AIRDUCT.\n\nInstall an AIRDUCT somewhere near the Reactor.
translation: tenpo ni la sina wile pana e kon pona tawa jan. ni li kepeken NASIN LUPA KON.\n\no pana e NASIN LUPA KON lon poka pi ilo wawa.

english: The AIRDUCT needs to be powered from the REACTOR.  Select CABLES from the CONSTRUCTION menu.
translation: NASIN LUPA KON li wile e wawa tan ILO WAWA. o wile e LINJA WAWA tan lipu PALI.

english:
Drag a power cable from the REACTOR to the AIRDUCT, connecting the red circles.

POWER CABLES are used to connect reactors to any equipment that needs power.

POWER CABLES are red and must connect red circles on equipment.
translation:
o sitelen e linja wawa tan ILO WAWA tawa NASIN LUPA KON. o wan e sike loje.

LINJA WAWA li wan e ilo wawa e ilo pi wile wawa.

LINJA WAWA li loje li wile luka e sike loje lon ilo.

english: The AIRDUCT needs OXYGEN, in the same way as the REACTOR needs FUEL. We can use an OXYGEN LOADER to provide OXYGEN.\n\nInstall an OXYGEN LOADER near the AIRDUCT.
translation: NASIN LUPA KON li wile e KON PONA sama ni: ILO WAWA li wile e TELO WAWA. ILO PI TAWA KON li ken pana e KON PONA.\n\no pana e ILO PI TAWA KON lon poka pi NASIN LUPA KON.

english: Drag a PIPE from the OXYGEN LOADER to the AIRDUCT, connecting the BLUE circles.
translation: o sitelen e NASIN LUPA tan ILO PI TAWA KON tawa NASIN LUPA KON. o wan e sike LASO.

english: The AIRDUCT is activated and is pressurising the cabin! The atmosphere will soon be breathable.
translation: NASIN LUPA KON li pali pona li kon e tomo! tenpo kama poka la kon tomo li pona tawa jan.
ILO PI WAWA TAWA

english: The ship has two factory fitted engines ready to go, but we need to connect them up.
translation: ilo tawa li jo e ilo tu pi wawa tawa lon poki. sina wile pana e ona tawa tomo.

english: Engines require both POWER and FUEL to operate. We must connect both engines to fuel and power.
translation: ilo pi wawa tawa la pali li wile e WAWA e TELO WAWA. o wan e ilo e telo wawa e wawa.

english: Let's start with the starboard engine. Use the pipes menu to run a pipe from the engine to your existing yellow fuel lines.
translation: sina kama open kepeken ilo pi nasin mun. o kepeken lipu pali pi nasin lupa. o sitelen e nasin lupa tan ilo pi wawa tawa tawa nasin lupa jelo lon pi telo wawa.

english: Now use the CABLES menu to power up the engine, by connecting it to your existing red power lines.
translation: tenpo ni la o kepeken lipu sitelen pi LINJA WAWA. o wawa e ilo pi wawa tawa: o wan e ona e linja wawa loje lon.

english: Fantastic work! The Starboard engine is now starting up.
translation: pona mute a! ilo tawa wawa pi nasin mun li open pali lon tenpo ni.

english: Now repeat the process with the port engine. Connect the fuel and power lines to start the engine.
translation: tenpo ni la o pali sama kepeken ilo pi wawa tawa lon nasin tomo. o wan e ilo e nasin lupa pi telo tawa e linja wawa. ni li open e pali pi ilo ni.

english: Both of our engines are now operational.
translation: tenpo ni la ilo tu pi wawa tawa li pali pona.
TAWA SULI

english: We cannot deliver those passengers to their destination without Faster-Than-Light travel. Unfortunately this ship is not equipped with its own FTL drive.\n\nWe'll need to buy one and set it up.
translation: sina wile tawa e jan tawa ma wile ona la sina wile e tawa suli. ike la ilo tawa sina li jo ala e ilo pi tawa suli.\n\nsina o esun e ilo o pana e ona tawa tomo.

english: Open the trade screen to purchase an FTL drive.
translation: ilo pi tawa suli la wile esun la o open e lipu esun.

english: The items we need are listed under PROPULSION. Select that category.
translation: kulupu nimi pi ilo wile li lon anpa pi nimi WAWA TAWA.

english: Add one FTL drive to our order by clicking on the entry in the list.
translation: o open esun e ilo wan pi tawa suli: o luka e ona lon kulupu nimi.

english: FTL drives consume one fuel charge per jump. Add 5 FTL Charges to the order as well.
translation: tawa suli wan li kepeken poki wawa wan pi tawa suli. o esun kin e poki 5.
o pini e esun.

english: A shuttle will deliver the items to us.
translation: poki tawa li kama e ijo esun tawa sina.

english: Install the FTL drive anywhere in your ship.
translation: o pana e ilo pi tawa suli lon tomo tawa sina lon ma pi pilin sina.

english: Connect the FTL drive to your power network.
translation: o wan e ilo pi tawa suli e wawa pi ilo tawa sina.

english: We can make things more efficient for our crew by telling them to store FTL Charges near the FTL drive.\n\nSelect STORAGE from the CONSTRUCTION toolbar, then select FTL Charges from the list.
translation: poki wawa li awen lon poka ilo pi tawa suli la ni li pona e pali jan.\n\no wile e MA AWEN tan sitelen ilo PALI. o wile e poki wawa pi tawa suli tan kulupu nimi.

english: Now drag out a storage zone near to the FTL drive.
translation: o sitelen e ma awen lon poka ilo pi tawa suli.

english: The crew will move all the FTL Charges into this zone.
translation: jan li kama tawa e poki wawa ale pi tawa suli tawa ma awen ni.
PALI SULI PI LUPA MUN

english: This screen shows the phases that require construction in order to complete the STARGATE.\n\nWe are in PHASE 1. Work has only just begun.
translation: lipu ni li pana lukin e tenpo pali pi LUPA MUN. pini ona li wile e ni ale.\n\nsina lon TENPO 1. pali li open taso lon tenpo pini poka.

english:
On the left of the screen you can see the requirements to complete PHASE 1.

We need to manufacture:
- 100 STARGATE FRAMES
- 10 STARGATE RESIN
translation:
poka wan pi lupu ni sina lukin e wile ale tawa pini pi TENPO 1.

sina wile pali e:
- SIJELO 100 PI LUPA MUN
- KO 10 PI LUPA MUN

english: These PHASE 1 components are easy to manufacture, and we already have what we need onboard.\n\nBut we can sell them to the STARGATE PROJECT for a small fortune.
translation: TENPO 1 la pali pi ijo wile li pona. ijo wile ale pi pali ni li lon tomo lon tenpo ni.\n\ntaso sina ken pana esun e ona tawa PALI PI LUPA MUN. mani mute li kama tawa sina tan ni.

english: Close the STARGATE screen by clicking on the toolbar again (or press ESC).
translation: o pini e lipu pi LUPA MUN kepeken luka pi sitelen lawa lon tenpo sin (anu o luka e nena ESC).

english: We are now going to learn how to produce STARGATE FRAMES.
translation: tenpo ni la sina kama sona e pali ni: SIJELO PI LUPA MUN.
PALI

english: Components are manufactured in a FABRICATOR, using raw materials like METAL INGOTS.\n\nInstall a FABRICATOR somewhere in the South East quadrant of the station.
translation: pali pi ijo wile li kama tan ILO PALI kepeken ijo sama LEKO KIWEN SUNO.\n\no pana e ILO PALI lon ma ni pi tomo sina: nasin anpa en nasin mun.

english: Those components are then assembled into finished products on an ASSEMBLY TABLE.\n\nInstall an ASSEMBLY TABLE somewhere near the FABRICATOR.
translation: ijo ni li kama ijo pali pini lon SUPA PALI.\n\no pana e SUPA PALI lon poka pi ILO PALI.

english: This new equipment needs power.  Build POWER CABLES to connect your REACTOR to the FABRICATOR and ASSEMBLY TABLE.
translation: ilo sin li wile e wawa. o sitelen e LINJA WAWA o wan e ILO WAWA e ILO PALI e SUPA PALI.

english: We need to configure the new equipment to make the products that we want.\n\nRIGHT CLICK on the FABRICATOR to configure it.
translation: o lawa e nasin pali pi ilo sin.\n\no LUKA ANTE e ILO PALI o lawa e nasin ona.

english: This drop-down menu shows all of the components that we can manufacture in a FABRICATOR.\n\nSelect FRAME from the list.
translation: kulupu nimi ni li pana lukin e ijo pali ken ale pi ILO PALI.\n\no wile e SIJELO ILO tan lipu.

english: We need to configure the ASSEMBLY TABLE in the same way.\n\nRIGHT CLICK on the assembly table.
translation: o lawa e nasin pi SUPA PALI lon nasin sama.\n\no LUKA ANTE e supa pali.

english: Select STARGATE FRAME from the drop-down menu.
translation: o wile e SIJELO PI LUPA MUN tan kulupu nimi.

english: Close the Equipment Panel by clicking the X in the top right corner, or pressing ESC.
translation: o pini e lipu ilo: o luka e sitelen X lon nasin sewi, anu o luka e nena ESC.

english: Close the Equipment Panel by clicking the X in the top right corner, or pressing ESC.
translation: o pini e lipu ilo: o luka e sitelen X lon nasin sewi, anu o luka e nena ESC.

english: Your crew are now fabricating FRAMES out of METAL INGOTS, then assembling those FRAMES into STARGATE FRAMES, which we can sell to the STARGATE project for profit.
translation: tenpo ni la jan sina li pali e SIJELO ILO tan LEKO KIWEN SUNO. pini ni la, jan li pali e SIJELO PI LUPA MUN kepeken sijelo ilo. pali suli pi LUPA MUN la esun pana ni li pana e mani mute.
ILO KIWEN SELI

english: We are going to need a lot of METAL INGOTS if we're to make enough of those STARGATE FRAMES.\n\nWe don't have many METAL INGOTS on board, and will run out soon.
translation: SIJELO PI LUPA MUN la pali pi mute pona li wile e LEKO KIWEN SUNO mute.\n\nsina jo ala e LEKO KIWEN SUNO mute lon tomo lon tomo. ona li kama weka lon tenpo kama poka.

english: But we do have plenty of SCRAP METAL, and we can melt that down in a SMELTER.\n\nBuild a SMELTER somewhere near the production line.
translation: taso sina jo e KIWEN SUNO PAKALA mute, li ken telo e ona kepeken ILO KIWEN SELI.\n\no pana e ILO KIWEN SELI lon poka pi nasin pali.

english: Connect the smelters to the REACTOR using POWER CABLES
translation: o wan e ilo kiwen wawa e ILO WAWA kepeken LINJA WAWA

english: Right click on the SMELTER and set its material to be SCRAP METAL.
translation: o luka ante e ILO KIWEN SELI o lawa e ijo ona tawa KIWEN SUNO PAKALA.

english: The crew will now load in all the SCRAP METAL and smelt it into much more useful METAL INGOTS.
translation: tenpo ni la jan li pana e KIWEN SUNO PAKALA ale li pona e ona tawa LEKO KIWEN SUNO pi pona kepeken mute.

english: There is a ton of RUINED EQUIPMENT around this old station, that we can break down into SCRAP METAL.\n\nSelect DISMANTLE from the CONSTRUCTION toolbar.
translation: ILO PAKALA mute li lon poka pi tomo ni. sina ken pakala e ona tawa KIWEN SUNO PAKALA.\n\no wile e PALI PAKALA tan sitelen lawa PALI.

english: We can make things more efficient for our crew by telling them to store SCRAP METAL near to the SMELTER.\n\nSelect STORAGE from the CONSTRUCTION toolbar, then select SCRAP METAL from the list.
translation: sina ken pona e pali kiwen. o toki e ni tawa jan: o awen e KIWEN SUNO PAKALA lon poka pi ILO KIWEN SELI.\n\no wile e AWEN tan sitelen lawa PALI.

english: Now drag out a storage zone near to the SMELTER.
translation: tenpo ni la o sitelen e ma leko awen lon poka pi ILO KIWEN SELI.

english: The crew will move all the SCRAP METAL into this zone.
translation: jan li kama tawa e KIWEN SUNO PAKALA ale tawa ma ni.
ESUN

english: Your crew will now use the equipment to produce some STARGATE FRAMES.
translation: tenpo ni la jan sina li kama kepeken ilo pali. ona li kama pali e SIJELO PI LUPA MUN.

english: We can use the TRADE system to buy raw materials to produce more STARGATE FRAMES, as well as resources we will need to survive.\n\nReopen the TRADE screen.
translation: SIJELO PI LUPA MUN la wile pali mute la sina ken kepeken nasin ESUN. kin la sina ken esun e ijo suli ante tawa awen jan.\n\no open sin e lipu ESUN.

english: METALLIC MINERALS can be smelted into METAL INGOTS just like SCRAP METAL.\n\nAdd all the METALLIC MINERALS to the trade.
translation: sina ken pona e KIWEN PI KIWEN SUNO tawa LEKO KIWEN SUNO sama KIWEN SUNO PAKALA.\n\nKIWEN PI KIWEN SUNO la o pana e ale tawa esun.

english: We will also need another SMELTER to begin processing those METALLIC MINERALS.\n\nFind the SMELTER under the INDUSTRY tab and add one to the order.
translation: sina wile kin e ILO KIWEN SELI kin wan. ilo sin li ken pona e KIWEN PI KIWEN SUNO.\n\no alasa e ILO KIWEN SELI lon lipu PALI. o pana e wan ni tawa kulupu esun.

english:
This is a good opportunity to stock up on some other resources that are critical for life support.

We'd recommend you purchase:

 - 2x FUEL
 - 2x OXYGEN
 - 2x WATER
 - 2x FOOD

- HIRE 5 MORE CREW

CONFIRM the order when you are done.
translation:
ni li tenpo pona tawa ni: sina kama jo e ijo suli pi awen jan.

pona la o esun e:

 - 2x TELO WAWA
 - 2x KON PONA
 - 2x TELO
 - 2x MOKU

- O ESUN E JAN MUTE 5

O LUKIN PONA e esun lon pini.

english: Once those goods have arrived, you should install your second SMELTER somewhere near the first.
translation: ijo esun li pini kama la o pana e ILO KIWEN SELI nanpa tu lon poka pi nanpa wan.

english: Set the SMELTER to process those METALLIC MINERALS you bought into more METAL INGOTS.
translation: o lawa e ILO KIWEN SELI tawa ni: ona li pona e KIWEN PI KIWEN SUNO tan esun sina tawa LEKO KIWEN SUNO.

english: Well done, you are now all set to produce STARGATE FRAMES.
translation: pali pona. tenpo ni la sina ken pali e SIJELO PI LUPA MUN.

english: We will need a crew. Hire five CREW MEMBERS from the TRADE screen.
translation: o esun e JAN 5 tan lipu ESUN.

english: NOTE: You can SHIFT CLICK to hire in multiples of 5.
translation: O SONA: wile esun jan pi nanpa 5 la sina ken LUKA SHIFT.

english: Those crew will also need SPACESUITS as there is no atmosphere onboard our ship yet.\n\nOrder five SPACESUITS for the new crew.
translation: kin la jan sin li wile e LEN MUN tan ni: tomo li jo ala e kon lon tenpo ni.\n\njan sin la o esun e LEN MUN 5.
o PINI PONA e esun.

english: Your new crew will arrive by shuttle.
translation: jan sin li kama kepeken tomo tawa lili.

english:
We also need resources for the ship to function.

Use the TRADE screen to buy:
- 5x FUEL
- 5x OXYGEN
- 5x FTL CHARGE
- 2x FOOD
- 2x WATER.

CONFIRM the trade when you are done.
translation:
ilo tawa li wile kin e ijo sulo.

o kepeken lipu ESUN o esun e:
-n 5x TELO WAWA
- 5x KON PONA
- 5x WAWA PI TAWA SULI
- 2x MOKU
- 2x TELO.

o PONA e esun lon pini.

english: Your crew will now power up the ship and bring the engines and life support online.
translation: tenpo ni la jan li pana e wawa tawa ilo tawa. ni li open e ilo pi wawa tawa e ilo pi awen jan.
TAWA SEWI

english: We can directly control our engine THROTTLE from here.\n\nTry increasing your engine throttle with this control.
translation: sina ken lawa e NANPA WAWA pi tawa ilo lon ni.\n\no suli e wawa tawa kepeken ni.

english: We can also turn the ship by left clicking in TACTICAL mode, in the direction we wish to travel.
translation: kin la sina ken tawa sike e ilo tawa. o luka lon lipu pi NASIN UTALA.

english: We can send our ship to a specific location by RIGHT-CLICKING. Try setting a destination by right clicking in the tactical view.
translation: sina ken tawa e ilo tawa sina tawa ma wile kepeken LUKA ANTE. o pana e ma wile kepeken luka ante lon lipu pi nasin utala.

english: Your crew will continue to operate the ship and keep the engines running as you travel around. Try flying around the system until you have a handle on the controls.\n\nWhen you are ready, bring the ship to a stop by setting the THROTTLE to zero in TACTICAL mode.
translation: tawa la jan li awen pali lon tomo tawa li awen e pona ilo pi wawa tawa. o tawa lili lon ma ni tawa suli po sona lawa sina.\n\nwile pini la o pini e tawa kepeken nanpa ala lon ilo lawa pi WAWA TAWA lon lipu pi NASIN UTALA.
PALI ESUN

english: Now that our ship is up and running, we need to earn our way.  We can complete contracts for financial reward and reputation.\n\nOpen the CONTRACTS screen to see a list of available contracts.
translation: ilo tawa li pona ken la sina wile kama jo e mani. sina pini pona e pali esun la ni li pana e mani e pilin pona pi jan ante tawa sina.\n\no open e lipu pi PALI ESUN. ni la o lukin e kulupu pi pali esun ken.

english: Contracts are assigned to the ship you currently have selected.\n\nOnly the PROCYON can travel between locations, so select the PROCYON.
translation: ilo tawa lon li jo e pali esun.\n\nilo PROCYON taso li ken tawa ma sin la o kepeken ilo PROCYON.

english: Here we have a TRANSPORT PASSENGER contract, click it to see more details.
translation: ni li pali esun pi TAWA JAN. wile lukin e toki ale ona la o luka e ona.

english: This mission requires us to transport a group of people from here to another location in the sector.\n\nClick the accept button to assign this contract to the PROCYON.
translation: pali esun ni li wile e ni: sina tawa e kulupu jan tawa ma ante lon kipisi ma mun ni.\n\no luka e nena pona. ni li pana e pali esun ni tawa ilo PROCYON.

english: The passengers will be delivered to the PROCYON by shuttle.
translation: jan tawa li kama tawa tomo PROCYON kepeken tomo tawa lili.

english: All passengers have been delivered to the PROCYON, and our FTL drive is operational. We must now plot an FTL jump to their destination.\n\nOpen the SECTOR MAP.
translation: jan tawa ale li lon tomo PROCYON. ilo pi tawa suli li ken. tenpo ni la o wile e nasin pi tawa suli.\n\no open e SITELEN MA.

english:
This is a map of all the systems in this sector.

Our ship and our space station are located in the middle, where the map is marked YOU-ARE-HERE.

Set a course to the destination (labelled TRANSPORT PASSENGERS) by clicking on it.
translation:
ni li sitelen ma pi kulupu sike ale lon kipisi ma mun ni.

ilo tawa en tomo mun sina li lon insa, lon sitelen pi toki SINA LON.

o pana e nasin tawa ma wile (li jo e nimi O TAWA E JAN) kepeken luka.

english: Close the SECTOR MAP by clicking the X in the top right corner, or by pressing ESC.
translation: o pini e SITELEN MA kepeken sitelen X lon sewi.

english: Open the FTL screen to order the FTL jump.
translation: wile tawa suli la o open e lipu pi tawa suli.

english: Click on PREPARE JUMP to align the ship and prepare for hyperspace.
translation: wile open pi tawa suli la o luka e nena pi O OPEN E TAWA SULI.

english: The PROCYON will align for hyperspace, and prepare the FTL drive to make the jump.
translation: ilo PROCYON li tawa sike tawa nasin pona pi tawa suli. ona li ken e ilo pi tawa suli.

english: Click the JUMP button to jump to hyperspace.
translation: wile open pi tawa suli la o luka e nena pi TAWA SULI
sina lon tawa suli!

english: We have arrived at the destination system.
translation: sina lon kulupu sike wile.

english: We now need to turn in our completed passenger contract.\n\nOpen the CONTRACTS screen and select the passenger mission.
translation: tenpo ni la sina wile pini e pali esun pi tawa jan.\n\no open e lipu pi PALI ESUN. o wile e pali esun pi tawa jan.

english: Click the DELIVER button to drop off the passengers and receive payment
translation: o luka e nena PANA. ni li pana e jan tawa li kama e mani.

english: A shuttle will be dispatched to collect the passengers.
translation: tomo tawa lili li kama li tawa weka e jan tawa.

english: The passengers have all arrived safely. You will now be paid the fee and will also receive points toward your Humanitarian rating - giving you access to more difficult and lucrative missions.
translation: jan ale li pini tawa pona. tenpo ni la sina kama jo e mani. kin la nanpa sina pi pona jan li kama suli. ni li open e nasin tawa pali esun sin. pali esun sin li ken wile e pali pi suli mute la ona li ken pana e mani mute.
PINI PI PANA SONA

english: We've covered the basics. You've learnt how to install equipment on your ship, and how to navigate space.
translation: sina sona e ijo suli. sina ken pana e ilo tawa tomo tawa. sina ken tawa sewi mun.

english: The career you choose is now up to you.  There are many opportunities to choose from, and you'll learn more as you work.\n\nOpen the CONTRACTS board.
translation: tenpo ni la nasin sina li kama tan wile sina. nasin mute li ken. pali la sina kama sona mute.\n\no open e lipu pi PALI ESUN.

english: Keep a keen eye out for special systems on the map, you never know who or what you may find there.
translation: o alasa pona e kulupu sike nasa lon sitelen ma. tenpo ala la jan li sona e ni: ijo seme anu jan seme li lon ma ni?

english: Whatever you choose, more instructions will be given when required.\n\nIt's up to you what you do next.
translation: nasin ale la sona mute li kama lon tenpo wile.\n\nnasin kama li tan wile sina.
[pini pi pana sona - nanpa musi Apa 11]

english: Are you sure you wish to skip the tutorial?
translation: sina wile ala wile weka e pana sona?

O KAMA SONA

english: We are now going to learn how to produce STARGATE RESIN.
translation: tenpo ni la o kama sona pali e KO PI LUPA MUN.

english: Turning our attention back to the Stargate, the Stargate project also requires us to produce STARGATE RESIN.\n\nWe are going to use the INDUSTRIOUS to collect METREON GAS, refine it, and process it into STARGATE RESIN.
translation: sin la o toki lon lupa mun. pali ona li wile e KO PI LUPA MUN.\n\nkepeken ilo INDUSTRIOUS la sina kama jo e KON METEJAN. sina pona e ona tawa KO PI LUPA MUN.

english:
Raise enough money to purchase for INDUSTRIOUS:

- 1x GAS COLLECTOR
- 1x REFINERY
- 1x CHEMICAL LAB
translation:
o kama jo e mani pi mute pona. ilo INDUSTRIOUS la sina wile esun e:

-1x ILO ALASA KON
- 1x ILO PI PALI PONA
-1 1x SUPA PALI PI SONA SELI

english: Before we can start collecting the METREON GAS, we need to move the INDUSTRIOUS to a system containing a GAS CLOUD.\n\nUse the SECTOR MAP to select a suitable destination.
translation: sina wile kama jo e kon Metejan la sina wile tawa e ilo INDUSTRIOUS tawa kulupu sike pi KON KO.\n\no alasa e nasin pona kepeken SITELEN MA.

english: Close the sector map and use the FTL Window to jump the INDUSTRIOUS to the nebula.
translation: o pini e sitelen ma. kepeken lipi pi tawa suli la o tawa e ilo INDUSTRIOUS tawa kon ko.

english: Install the GAS COLLECTOR, REFINERY and CHEMICAL LAB so that they are close to each other.
translation: o pana e ILO ALASA KON e ILO KIWEN SELI e SUPA PALI PI SONA SELI. ale o kulupu poka.

english: Power up the GAS COLLECTOR, REFINERY and CHEMICAL LAB.
translation: o wawa e ILO ALASA KON e ILO PI PALI PONA e SUPA PALI PI SONA SELI.

english: Right click on the REFINERY and set its recipe to REFINE METREON GAS.
translation: o luka ante e ILO PI KPALI PONA. o lawa e nasin pali ona tawa PONA KON METEJAN.

english: Right click on the CHEMICAL LAB and set its recipe to MAKE STARGATE RESIN.
translation: o luka ante e SUPA PALI PI SONA SELI. o lawa e nasin pali ona tawa KO PI LUPA MUN.

english: Connect the GAS COLLECTOR to the REFINERY with a PIPE.
translation: o wan e ILO ALASA KON e ILO PI PALI PONA kepeken NASIN LUPA.

english: Connect the REFINERY to the CHEMICAL LAB with a PIPE.
translation: O WAN e ILO PI PALI PONA e SUPA PALI PI SONA SELI kepeken NASIN LUPA.

english: Well done, you have started to produce STARGATE RESIN.\n\nWhen you have produced enough, travel back to any COLONY, SHIP YARD or the STARGATE system to sell it to the STARGATE PROJECT.
translation: pali pona. sina open pali e KO PI LUPA MUN.\n\npini pali pi mute pona la o tawa KULUPU TOMO JAN anu MA PALI PI ILO TAWA anu kulupu sike pi LUPA MUN. ma ni la o esun e ko tawa KULUPU PALI PI LUPA MUN.
PINI PI PANA SONA
POKA LUPA

english: We are now going to learn how to dock your ship to another ship.
translation: tenpo ni la sina kama sona poka lupa e ilo tawa sina tawa ilo tawa ante.

english: In order to be able to dock successfully, your ship needs at least four working THRUSTERS.\n\nUse a different ship, or purchase and install four thrusters at a nearby trading post.
translation: wile pi poka lupa pona la ilo tawa sina li wile e ILO LILI PI WAWA TAWA lon nanpa tu tu anu mute.\n\no kepeken ilo tawa ante anu o esun o pana e ilo lili tu tu pi wawa tawa lon tomo esun poka.

english: Use your main ship engines to get close to the *X.
translation: wile lon poka *X la o kepeken tawa meso pi ilo tawa sina.

english: Zoom in so that you can see the docking guides more clearly. They are RED diamonds extending from the docking ports.
translation: wile lukin pona pi nasin poka lupa la o suli e sitelen lukin sina. nasin li leko LOJE (pi tawa sike) lon poka lupa.
o open e ilo lawa ni: ILO LILI PI WAWA TAWA.

english:
Use your THRUSTERS to maneuver your ship so that RED diamonds of your docking ports align with the docking port of the *X.

When aligned correctly, they will both turn YELLOW.

Keep the ships aligned until the docking bridge is fully extended.
translation:
o kepeken ILO LILI PI WAWA TAWA. o tawa e ilo tawa sina kepeken nasin ni: leko LOJE pi lupa sina li lon sama lupa *X.

lon pona la leko tu li kama JELO.

lupa tu li poka pona la nasin lupa li wan e tu. pini ni ala la o awen pona e lon pi ilo tawa sina.

english: Well done. You have docked successfully!
translation: Bien hecho. sina pona. sina poka lupa pona! pali pona.
TAWA JAN PI TOMO TAWA

english: We are now going to learn how to transfer crew from one ship to another.\n\nThe two ships must be docked so that the crew can walk from one ship to another.
translation: tenpo ni la o kama sona tawa e jan tawa tomo tawa wan tan ante.\n\ntomo tawa tu o poka lupa. poka lupa la jan li ken tan tomo wan tawa ante.

english: First, switch back to normal view by leaving tactical mode.
translation: open la o tawa sitelen nasin tan weka pi nasin utala.

english: Select the UMC Astral Temptress. \n\n As you can see it has no crew.
translation: o wile e ilo UMC Astral Temptress. \n\n sina ken lukin e ni: jan li weka.
o open e lipu lawa pi tawa ilo

english: Select the SOURCE ship that the crew will come FROM.
translation: o wile e tomo KAMA pi jan tawa.

english: Click in the CREW cell of the DESTINATION ship to request 5 crew to transfer.
translation: o luka e POKI JAN lon tomo TAWA. ni li pana e lawa ni: o tawa e jan 5.

english: NOTE: You can SHIFT CLICK to request transfer in multiples of 5.
translation: O SONA: wile tawa pi jan 5 lon tenpo la o LUKA SHIFT.

english: Excellent. Now we just need to wait for the crew to transfer.
translation: pona mute. tenpo ni la o awen tan tawa jan.

english: Well done. You have transferred some crew successfully!
translation: pona. sina tawa pona e jan!
UTALA
o tawa nasin utala.
o open e sitelen lawa pi utala ilo.

english: You can see the range of weapons by hovering over them. Weapons will shoot at enemy ships in their range.
translation: sina ken lukin e suli nasin pi ilo utala lon nasin ni: o tawa e luka ona lon poka ona.

english:
Your guns can also target specific points on enemy ships.

First, select which guns you would like to use.

You can SHIFT CLICK to select multiple guns.
translation:
ilo utala li ken kin pakala e ma wile lon ilo tawa ike.

nanpa wan la o wile e ilo utala kepeken.

wile pi ilo mute la sina ken LUKA SHIFT.

english: Target their weapon systems so that they can't damage you further.
translation: o wile e ilo utala pi jan ike la ona li pakala ala e sina lon tenpo kama.

english: The effect of the EMP is wearing off!\n\nDeploy your weapons and make your crew ready to fight by clicking on BATTLE STATIONS.
translation: pali EMP li kama pini!\n\no open e ilo utala. o ken e pali utala jan kepeken ni: o luka e POKI JAN UTALA.

english: Make sure to keep moving during combat, this increases your EVASION and makes you a harder target to hit.
translation: pona la o tawa mute lon tenpo utala. tawa li suli e TAWA WEKA TAN PAKALA. ni la jan ike li ken ala pakala pona e sina.

english: Well done. You have learned how to use weapons. Now fire at will at the pirate ship!
translation: sina pona. sina kama sona e nasin pi ilo utala. tenpo ni la o pakala e jan ike lanpan!
ALASA KIWEN

english: We are now going to learn how to mine and collect resources from asteroids.
translation: tenpo ni la o kama sona alasa kiwen tan kiwen mun.

english: You will need a Mining Laser. These use a lot of power so consider installing extra reactors or batteries.\n\nInstall a MINING LASER and connect it to the power grid.
translation: sina wile e ilo alasa kiwen suno.  ni li kepeken wawa mute la sina kin wile pana e ilo wawa e poki wawa namako.\n\no pana e ILO ALASA KIWEN SUNO.  o wan e ona e nasin wawa.

english: Make sure to UNDOCK from any other ship (from the TACTICAL screen).
translation: pona la o PINI E POKA LUPA tan tomo tawa ante ale (kepeken lipu pi NASIN UTALA).

english: Look at the rocks on the map, these indicate ASTEROID BELTS. \n\nFly to a system in an asteroid belt, it will probably contain Tilium Ore.
translation: o lukin e kiwen lon sitelen ma. ni li KULUPU KIWEN MUN. \n\no tawa kulupu sike lon kulupu kiwen. ken suli la ona li jo e kiwen Silija

english: This system seems to have asteroids containing Tilium Ore, fly close to one of them.
translation: lukin la kulupu sike ni li jo e kiwen Silija lon kiwen mun.
o tawa nasin utala
o open e lipu lawa pi ilo utala

english: You can see the range of mining lasers by hovering over them. Mining lasers will fire at mineral patches in their field of fire.
translation: luka sina li lon poka la sina ken lukin e suli ken pi ilo alasa kiwen suno. ilo li pakala e kiwen lon ken ona.

english:
You can also target specific mineral patches.

First, select which laser you would like to use.

You can SHIFT CLICK to select multiple lasers.
translation:
kin la sina ken wile e nasin alasa.

open la o wile e ilo alasa kepeken.

wile pi ilo mute la o LUKA SHIFT.

english: Target a Tilium Ore patch by clicking on one while having a mining laser selected.
translation: kepeken ilo alasa kiwen suno la o alasa e kiwen Silija kepeken luka.

english: Move your ship until the mineral patch is in the range of fire.
translation: o tawa e ilo tawa sina lon poka kiwen.

english: Drones will collect mined resources.\n\nInstall a DRONE BAY so your drones can collect the Tilium Ore.
translation: ilo tawa ilo li kama e kiwen.\n\no pana e TOMO PI ILO TAWA ILO la ilo li ken kama e kiwen Silija.

english: You also need to make sure that GATHER MATERIALS is enabled in FLEET ORDERS.
translation: ni kin li wile: NASIN LAWA KULUPU li wile ken ALASA.

english: You will need to smelt the raw Tilium Ore to crystals.\n\nInstall a SMELTER.
translation: sina wile pona e kiwen Silija tawa mani suno Silija.\n\no pana e ILO KIWEN SELI.

english: Right click on the SMELTER and select TILIUM ORE to smelt it into Tilium Crystals.
translation: o luka ante e ILO KIWEN SELI. o wile e KIWEN SILIJA. ni li pona e ona tawa mani suno Silija.

english: Perfect! Now wait for your smelter to smelt the Tilium Ore.
translation: pona mute! tenpo ni la o awen taso tan pali Silija pi ilo kiwen seli.
ESUN PI ILO TAWA

english: We are now going to learn about selecting and buying ships.
translation: tenpo ni la o kama sona e nasin esun pi ilo tawa.

english: Click on the JMC MINING STATION, an old unused industrial station for sale.
translation: o luka e tomo JMC MINING STATION. tomo ni pi alasa kiwen li wile esun li kama tan tenpo pini.

english: Click on the BUY button to purchase the JMC MINING STATION.
translation: o luka e nena ESUN. ni li esun e tomo JMC MINING STATION.

english: Well done, you have purchased the JMC MINING STATION.
translation: sina pona. sina esun e tomo JMC MINING STATION

english: It is the 23rd century.  Humanity has colonised the stars.
translation: ni li kulupu 23 pi sike suno.  jan li tawa ma mun li awen lon poka pi suno ante.

english: Millions now thrive on distant worlds, living hundreds of light years from Earth.
translation: jan mute li pona lon ma sike ante. mute li weka mute tan ma sike open.

english: As space becomes the new frontier, an era of unprecedented exploration and expansion unfolds.
translation: ma mun li ma wile sin la ni li tenpo sin. jan li tawa ma sin li kama suli.

english: Powerful corporations dominate entire regions, but beyond their reach lies uncharted territory, filled with untold mysteries and boundless opportunities.
translation: kulupu esun wawa li lawa e ma suli. ma ante weka la jan ala li sona. nasa en ken mute li lon.

english: The CEO of the INTERSTELLAR MINING CORPORATION has issued a daring challenge: build a stargate powerful enough to reach our nearest galaxy.
translation: wan li KULUPU INTERSTELLAR PI ALASA KIWEN. jan lawa ona li toki e ni tawa jan ale: o pali e lupa mun. lupa ni la jan li ken tawa kulupu suli ante pi suno mun.

english: With trillions in funding up for grabs, the stage is set for fearless adventurers to forge their own path in the cosmos.
translation: mani mute mute li tawa ni la ken ni li lon: jan pi monsuta ala li ken pali e nasin sin lon ale mun.

english: Will you rise to the challenge, and chart your own course among the stars?
translation: sina pilin monsuta ala monsuta? sina pali e nasin sina lon ale mun?

english: Captain, I'm the chief of security for this sector, and I need your help.
translation: jan lawa o mi jan lawa awen pi kipisi ma mun ni. mi wile e pona sina.

english: All across the sector, there are people in trouble who need our assistance.
translation: kipisi ma mun ni ale la jan li poka pakala li wile e pona.

english: I'm spread too thin. I can't be everywhere. You're more than capable, and I'll be there to offer advice when I can.
translation: mi ken ale ala. mi ken lon ale ala. sina wawa ken. wile la mi pana sona.

english: If you chose to help, I've marked the locations on your map, as GOLD HIGHLIGHTS.
translation: sina wile pona la mi sitelen e ma wile lon sitelen ma sina sama SUNO JELO.
jan lawa o sina pona.
soweli alasa li len sama soweli moku
soweli alasa li len sama soweli moku
jan lawa Aken
JAN AKEN

english: My name is Commander Harken, and I'm the Chief of Private Security for the sector.
translation: mi jan lawa Aken. mi jan lawa awen esun pi kipisi ma mun ni.

english: You have found the remains of the Interstellar Prospector. Please bring its Black Box Flight Recorder to me, and I will explain more.
translation: sina lukin e awen pakala pi ilo tawa Interstellar Prospector. pona la o kama e poki sona pimeja ona tawa mi. kama sina la mi pana e sona mute.

english: In order to collect the Flight Recorder you will need Drones, launched from a Drone Bay on your ship.  If you don't already have this equipment, you'll need to buy at least one DRONE BAY, and at least one LOGISTICS DRONE, from any colony or shipyard.
translation: alasa pi poki sona pimeja la sina wile e ilo tawa ilo. ona li tawa tan tomo pi ilo tawa ilo lon tomo tawa sina. sina jo ala e ni lon tenpo ni la sina wile esun e TOMO PI ILO TAWA ILO, e ILO TAWA ILO wan anu mute, tan kulupu tomo jan anu ma pali pi ilo tawa.

english: Thank you for returning the flight recorder, Captain.
translation: jan lawa o sina pana e poki sona pimeja la sina pona.

english: We are in the grip of a major crisis.  Commercial vessels laden with valuable cargo are being targeted and destroyed.  These vessels are under our protection - but often lack any serious defenses, and barely have a chance to send out a distress call before they are plundered.  This is a calculated assault on the free market trade and industry within this sector, and cannot be allowed to continue.
translation: mi lon pakala suli. poki tawa esun pi jo mani li pakala tan utala. mi o awen e ona. ona li jo ala e ilo utala awen wawa. mute la ona li ken pana taso e toki kon pi wile pona. ale li lanpan.

english: I'm sending you the coordinates of two more stricken vessels, pinpointing their last known locations before they went dark.  We need you to travel to the wreckage of each of these ships, and collect whatever evidence you can.
translation: mi pana e lon pi ilo tawa pakala tu.  ni li lon sona ona pi tenpo pini.  tenpo ni la toki ona li pimeja.  o tawa lon pakala.  o kama e ijo sona ken ale.

english: The primary objective is the safe recovery of their Black Box Flight Recorders, which will contain a log of their final moments.
translation: wile suli li ni: o kama pona e poki sona pimeja. poki li sona e tenpo pakala.

english: Here are the co-ordinates of the two shipwrecks we need you to visit.
translation: tawa wile la ni li lon pi tomo pakala tu.

english: The fourth vessel to be targeted managed to send out a distress call. Local security forces responded too late, and found nothing but the destroyed fuselage with a presumed loss of all crew.
translation: ilo tawa nanpa tu tu li pana e toki kon pi wile pona. tenpo kama pi jan utala awen poka li suli pi mute ike la ona li lukin taso e tomo pakala e jan moli.

english: This is the only image they managed to send, before their transmission went dead.
translation: tenpo pini tawa moli la ona li pana taso e sitelen ni.

english: We've analysed the black box recordings and the evidence is already pretty clear.  There's a pirate vessel out there somewhere, preying on high value commercial vessels.  They wait in silence, until the ship is alone, isolated, and defenseless.  They come out of nowhere and attack without warning, and before anybody can respond they've destroyed the ship and looted the cargo.
translation: mi lukin sona e sona tan poki sona pimeja. sona li kama: ilo tawa ike lanpan li lon li utala e ilo tawa esun pi mani mute.  ona li awen lon weka kalama la ilo tawa li lon kulupu ala li jo ala e nasin awen utala pona. jan ike li kama kepeken toki open ala. tenpo lili la jan li ken ala toki la ona li pakala e ilo tawa li lanpan e ijo jo ona.

english: I'll try and buy you a few more seconds, but it's going to go critical any moment.  Get to a safe distance as soon as you can, Captain.  Save my crew!

english: Greetings Captain. My name is Dr. Martinez and I'm reaching out to ask for your help.
translation: jan lawa o toki. mi jan sona Sulijanmasine. mi toki tan ni: mi wile e pona tan sina.

english: An accident with our equipment has left my brother in dire need of a rescue, and I need your help.
translation: pakala ilo la jan sama mi li wile mute e pona tan jan ante.  mi wile e pona sina.

english: The Stargate project funded our research from the beginning.  They buy all the data we can collect, and the closer we travel to the event horizon, the more data our sensors receive. Every mission, we'd push ourselves to go closer.
translation: pali suli pi lupa mun la kulupu lawa li pana e mani tawa pali sona mi tan tenpo open.  ona li esun e sona mi ale.  poka mute tawa selo pi lupa pimeja la, sona mute li kama tawa ilo lukin.  tawa pali sona ale la mi poka pi mute kin.

english: The last time, we pushed it too far.  My brother Marcus took the sensor ship and flew closer than we've ever been before.  Right to the edge.  Closer than anyone has ever been.
translation: tenpo pini poka la poka lupa li mute ike.  jan sama mi Makumasine li tawa e ilo tawa pi lukin sona lon poka pi mute wawa.  lon selo taso.  tenpo pini ale la jan ante li kama ala tawa poki pi mute ni lon lupa pimeja.

english: I've lost all contact, and he's been down there for a long time now.  He's still showing on the sensors, and his ship is still intact.  The gravitational forces and time dilation will be extreme.  But with your help, we're going to rescue him.
translation: mi ken ala kute e toki ona.  ona li weka lon pakala lon tenpo mute.  mi awen lukin e ona kepeken ilo lukin.  tomo tawa ona li pakala ala.  wawa tawa pi kon mun li wawa nasa.  ante suli tenpo nasa li wawa nasa.  taso pona sina la mi kama pona e ona.

english: There's only one way to get to him without falling into the black hole ourselves.  We're going to have to do an extremely short range HYPERSPACE HOP.
translation: mi wile ala tawa lupa pimeja la nasin wan taso pi kama jan li lon.  mi wile pali e TAWA SULI pi suli lili.

english: Using a modified FTL Drive you'll do one hyperspace hop toward the black hole, rescue my brother Marcus, then turn around and hop right out.  It will be dangerous, but it's the only way to avoid being dragged in ourselves.
translation: mi ken ante pi tawa lili e ilo pi tawa suli.  kepeken ni la sina pali e tawa suli lili wan tawa lupa pimeja.  sina kama e jan sama mi Makumasine.  ni la o tawa sike tawa monsi la o tawa suli lili weka.  ken pakala li suli la ona li nasin ken taso pi moli ala.

english: I need materials to synthesise the resources we need.  You can help me with this, while I work on the calculations. I'll need Hyperspace Isotopes - you should be able to collect them easily enough, but you'll need to acquire a Hyperspace Scoop first.
translation: mi wile pali e ijo wile pi pali ni.  ni la mi wile e ijo.  sina ken pona e ni lon tenpo mi pi pali sona nanpa.  mi wile e lili pi tawa suli.  alasa ona li pona la sina wile e ilo alasa kiwen uta.

translation: sina wile poki e lili pi tawa suli la o kepeken ilo tawa moku wawa.

english: I'm building the Hyperspace FTL drive that will allow you to perform the hop.  It's going to need some modifications.  I'll need you to manufacture some parts for me. I know you have manufacturing facilities near the Stargate project.  You should be able to make these parts for me without too much trouble.

translation: lukin la sina jo e ilo alasa kiwen uta!  kepeken la sina ken kama jo e lili pi tawa suli tan wile mi.

english: You'll need to install the Scoop facing forward on the front of your ship, then connect its pipe output to a storage tank.
translation: o pana e ilo alasa kiwen uta lon sinpin pi ilo tawa sina.  o wan e lupa weka ona e poki kepeken nasin lupa.

translation: jan lawa o.  mi pini e pali ante pi tawa lili tawa ilo pi tawa suli.

english: Please come and see me and I'll explain what I need from you.
translation: pona la o kama poka mi.  mi toki e wile.
jan lawa o.  sina pona tan kama.

english: I've completed work on the modified FTL drive, using those radioactive hyperspace isotopes you provided.
translation: kepeken lili la mi pini e pali pi ilo tawa suli.

english: With this FTL drive you'll be capable of performing an extremely short range FTL Hop in close proximity to the black hole.  You'll emerge directly on top of my twin brother's ship, and perform the rescue.
translation: ilo tawa suli ni pi tawa lili la sina ken tawa suli lili lon poka pi lupa pimeja.  sina pini e tawa lon poka tomo tawa pi jan sama mi.  tenpo ni la sina ken kama pona e jan ni.

english: You'll need to make two jumps - one in and one out.  I've checked and double checked the calculations.  I'll need your help to make two FTL charges that work with the modified FTL Hop Drive.
translation: sina wile pali e tawa suli lili tu: tawa weka en tawa kama.  mi lukin pona li lukin pona sin e sona tan pali nanpa.  mi wile e pona kin tan ni: o pali e poki wawa tu tan wile kepeken pi ilo tawa ante.

english: I'll need quite a lot of Tilium Crystals for the FTL charges.  Tilium ore can be mined from just about any asteroid belt in the system - but you will need a Mining Laser to do it, and Drones to collect the mineral.

translation: mi sona e ni: kulupu pali pi lupa mun li toki tawa sina li wile e sona ona.  mi sona e ni la ijo suli li kama pona pi jan sama mi.  tenpo la kulupu li awen pona ala e jan.

english: I'll contact you when I'm ready to begin the rescue.
translation: kama pona jan la tenpo kama la open li ken la mi toki tawa sina.

english: We heard about your involvement with the Martinez rescue mission and we wanted to offer our support.  The twins have been hugely important to the project from the beginning, and the data they have provided has enabled many of our biggest advancements.
translation: mi sona e ni: sina pona e kama pona pi jan Julijanmasine. mi mute li wile pona e pali sina.  pali pi jan sama tu ni li suli mute tawa pali mi tan tenpo open.  sona pi pali ona li pona mute e pali pi lupa mun.

english: Their entire operation is funded by us. So I'm sure you believe us when we say that their safe rescue is very important to us - but just as important is the recovery of the data that remains trapped on Marcus' stricken vessel.
translation: mi pana e mani ale tawa pali sona ona.  o pilin e ni: kama pona ona li suli mute tawa mi mute.  taso sama la sona li poki ike lon tomo tawa pakala pi jan Makumasine.  kama pona sona kin li suli sama tawa mi mute.

english: We see no reason why you can't rescue both Marcus and the critical science data at the same time. If you can recover our data during the rescue, we will pay a substantial bonus.
translation: pilin mi la sina ken kama pona e jan Makumasine e sona suli lon tenpo sama.  sina kama jo e sona la mi pana e mani namako tawa sina.

english: You'll be performing the rescue using my ship, using my modified FTL drive that is already installed onboard. You can take control of my ship when you are ready to begin the rescue.
translation: o kama pona e jan kepeken tomo tawa mi.  ona li jo e ilo tawa pi tawa suli lili lon tenpo ni.  sina wile open la o lawa e tomo tawa mi.

pakala seli seme li kama?

english: The ship didn't even manage to activate its Flight Recorder.  We must investigate.
translation: kin la ilo tawa li kepeken ala e poki sona pimeja.  mi wile alasa sona.

english: The Docking Port is still operational.  Dock your ship with the Celestial Hammer, and take a team on-board to look for survivors.
translation: awen la lupa suli li pona.  o poka lupa e tomo tawa sina e tomo Celestial Hammer.
o poka lupa e tomo Celestial Hammer
o pana e jan tu wan
o alasa e jan awen
ale li moli.

english: Could it have been some sort of catastrophic accident?
translation: tan pakala suli anu seme?

english: Your crew will repair the reactors and power up the ship. Once they're done, bring the ship back to spacedock. I need to do a proper forensic investigation.
translation: jan pali sina li pona e ilo wawa li wawa e tomo tawa.  pini la o kama e ona tawa tomo mun.
o awen tan pali pona pi ilo wawa [*X/3]

english: Transfer the ship to a Shipyard for analysis
translation: o pana e ilo tawa tawa ma pali pi ilo tawa tan wile pi alasa sona.

translation: ilo sona li open lon tenpo ni.

english: We should be able to get some answers. Have your crew start a data transfer so we can get the flight logs.
translation: pilin la mi ken kama jo e sona.  jan sina o open a pana sona ilo.  ni la mi kama jo e sona pi nasin tawa.
