english: Dismantling equipment removes it from your ship and places it in a box so you can install it later.
translation: sina weka e ilo tan tomo tawa sina la ona li lon poki.  sina ken pana sin e ona lon tenpo kama.

english: This equipment is ruined, so you'll receive scrap metal when you dismantle it.
translation: ilo ni li pakala ale.  weka ona la sina kama jo e kiwen suno pakala taso.

english: Any equipment can be dismantled by left-clicking.
translation: sina ken weka e ilo ale kepeken luka.

english: Let's use the scrap metal to produce metal ingots in the smelter. Right-click on the smelter.
translation: o pali e leko kiwen suno lon ilo kiwen seli kepeken kiwen suno pakala.  o luka ante e ilo kiwen seli.

english: The smelter will now start producing metal ingots after it has finished heating up.
translation: tenpo ni la ilo kiwen seli li open e seli.  seli li wawa pona la ona li open pali e leko kiwen suno.

english: Select the Stargate button in your toolbar to open the Stargate screen.
translation: o wile e nena pi lupa mun lon sitelen lawa.  ni li open e lipu pi lupa mun.

english: The Stargate screen displays everything you need to manufacture to complete the current phase.
translation: lipu pi lupa mun li pana lukin e sona wile pali ale pi tenpo pali ni.

english: Each component you need to manufacture is on the left.\nPlacing your mouse over a component's icon shows how to produce it.
translation: ijo pali wile li lon poka.\nsina tawa e luka sina lon poka ijo la ona li pana lukin e nasin pali.

english: The Stargate's construction is split into phases, with each phase requiring more and more resources.\nYou have just completed Phase 1.
translation: pali suli pi lupa mun li kama tan kipisi tenpo pali mute.  tenpo ale li wile e ijo ante.\ntenpo pini poka la sina pini e tenpo nanpa 1.

english: Select Phase 2 to see what you need to manufacture for this phase.
translation: o wile e tenpo pali nanpa 2.  sina kama lukin e ijo pali wile pi tenpo ni.

english: To complete Phase 2, we need to continue manufacturing Stargate Frames.\n\nInstead of 10, we now need 200!
translation: pini pi tenpo 2 la o awen pali e sijelo ilo pi lupa mun.\n\nmute 10 ala la, tenpi ni la mi wile e mute 200!

english: Sell your frames at a trading post to submit them to the Andromeda Project.
translation: o esun e sijelo ilo pi lupa mun tawa tomo esun.  ni li pana e ona tawa pali suli Antometa.

english: You can now close the Stargate screen.
translation: tenpo ni la o pini e lipu pi lupa mun.
jan Alesantejemelisa
jan Raymond Darnell
kulupu awen DOGMA

mani esun kama ale: $*X

english: Captain, I can see you've sold a batch of Stargate parts, but I've received no corresponding payment.  We agreed to split all revenue 50/50.  This setup is costing me a fortune and I need to start making my return.  Please transfer the funds to my account as soon as possible.
translation: jan lawa o, mi lukin e ni: sina pana esun e kulupu ijo pi lupa mun la, mi kama jo ala e mani tan ni.  tenpo pini la mi tu li toki e ni: mi tu li tu 50/50 e mani ale.  pali ni li kepeken mani mute mi.  mi wile kama jo e mani.  o pana e mani tawa poki mani mi lon tenpo kama pi poka mute.

english: Captain, I was sure I'd made our agreement clear.  Don't forget who owns this station, and all the equipment onboard.  50/50 was what we agreed.
translation: jan lawa o, mi sona e ni: mi ale li sona pona e nasin esun pi mi tu.  o weka ala e sona ni: mi jo e tomo ni e ilo ale lon insa ona.  nasin li kipisi 50/50.

english: Captain, I was sure I'd made our agreement clear.  Don't forget who owns this station, and all the equipment onboard.  50/50 was what we agreed.
translation: jan lawa o, mi sona e ni: mi ale li sona pona e nasin esun pi mi tu.  o weka ala e sona ni: mo jo e tomo ni e ilo ale lon insa ona.  nasin li kipisi 50/50

english: I thought I could trust you.  Pay me the money you owe, immediately, or I will be forced to escalate.
translation: tenpo pini la mi pilin e ni: sina toki pona.  o pana e mani wile tawa mi lon tenpo ni. ala la mi suli e ike utala.

english: Captain, this is your final warning.  You are now willfully withholding sales revenue that is legally mine.  If you don't pay what you owe immediately I will have no choice but to terminate our agreement, seize control of my station, and recover any financial losses directly from you.
translation: jan lawa o, ni li toki pini pi weka pakala.  tenpo ni la, sona sina la, sina jo e mani mi tan esun.  sina pana ala e mani mi tawa mi lon tenpo ni taso la, mi ken taso e ni: mi pini e nasin esun, li lanpan e lawa pi tomo mi, li lanpan e mani tan sina.

english: I'm disappointed, Captain. You're backing out after all the investment I've put into this project?
translation: mi pilin ike, jan lawa o.  mi pana e mani mute tawa nasin esun pi mi tu la sina tawa weka?
sina kama pilin ike tan ni.
tawa pona, jan lawa o.
tomo pali wawa A.J.E.
kulupu pali wawa mun

english: My name is Alexander James Elistar, and I'm the chairman and founder of A.J.E Industries.  I have a business proposition for you.  If you would be interested in setting up a production facility for me, I believe with some luck and a good deal of hard work we can both make substantial returns.
translation: mi jan Alesantejemelisa.  mi jan lawa tawa kulupu pali A.J.E.  mi wile toki esun tawa sina.  o pali e tomo pali tan wile mi.  pona li kama en pali pona mute la mani mute li kama tawa mi tu.

english: Please give me a call to discuss the details.
translation: pona la o toki tawa mi.  mi tu li toki lon ijo lili ale.
o toki tawa X

english: Captain.  Perhaps you are already aware, but there are big plans underway within this sector.  There are designs to build something... incredible, a transportation system with near infinite range, requiring state of the art manufacturing and industry.
translation: jan lawa o.  ken la sina sona lon tenpo ni: pali suli li kama lon kipisi ma mun ni.  pali suli pi ijo... wawa nasa.  nasin tawa pi ken suli ale.  ona li wile e nasin pali pi pona nanpa wan.

english: A stargate, big enough for our most massive fleets, shuttling humanity between galaxies as if they were nothing but neighbouring stars.  A new multi-galactic era for humanity.
translation: lupa mun li suli li ken poki e kulupu suli pi ilo tawa mun.  ona li tawa e jan tan kulupu suno wan tawa kulupu ante pi weka mute, sama suno pi poka taso.

english: In all my years I've never known so much capital to be allocated to one project.
translation: tenpo ale mi la mi lukin ala e ni: mani pi mute ni li tawa pali suli wan taso.

english: There is a golden opportunity here for us, but the barriers to entry are high.  I have the assets, the capital, and the facilities that we need to fulfil the Andromeda Project's massive ambitions.
translation: nasin pona li lon sinpin la, nasin li wile e ijo suli.  mi jo e mani e tomo pali.  ijo ni li ken pali e ijo wile pi pali suli Antometa.

english: Sadly, my days of running the shop floor in person are long behind me.  I need a floor manager, somebody who will oversee the day to day operations for me.  And my years of experience have taught me to spot talent when I see it.
translation: ike la mi ken ala lawa e nasin pali lon tenpo ni.  mi wile e jan lawa pali.  ona li lawa e pali lon tenpo suno ale tan mi.  tenpo mute pi kama sona la mi sona e ken pona lon tenpo lukin mi.

english: Here is my proposal.  I'll provide the factory station, and the seed capital so you are fully funded.  You'll set up the production facility for me, and oversee day to day operations, manufacturing parts for the Andromeda Project to their specifications.
translation: mi wile e ni: mi pana e tomo pali e mani open.  sina open e pali pi tomo pali.  sina lawa e nasin pali lon tenpo suno ale.  sina pali e ijo wile pi kulupu pali Antometa lon nasin wile ona.
mi tu 50/50 e mani namako.

english: And believe me when I say, there will be plenty to go around.
translation: o sona e ni: mani mute li kama.

english: Call Alexander about the production facility
translation: o toki tawa jan Alesantejemelisa lon tomo pali.
o wile e nasin esun tan jan Alesantejemelisa.

english: Wonderful news. I'm very happy you've agreed to partner with me on this. My factory space station is in position nearby, ready for us to use as our base of operations.
translation: pona mute.  mi pilin pona tan ni: mi tu li kulupu esun pali.  tomo pali mun ni li lon poka.  mi ken open kepeken ona.

english: This is the A.J.E Foundry.  A wonderful industrial facility, perfect for our needs.  I'll just need to provide you with some access codes so you can assume control of the facility.
translation: ni li tomo pali wawa A.J.E.  ni li tomo pali pona tawa wile mi.  mi wile taso pana e nanpa pi nasin lawa tawa sina.  ni la sina ken lawa e pali lon tomo ni.

english: Look at that.  For years I manufactured engines and FTL drives right here, for every fleet that passed through the sector.  It's really fallen into disrepair.
translation: o lukin.  tenpo pini suli la mi pali e ilo pi wawa tawa e ilo pi tawa suli lon ni.  ona li pali e ilo ale pi wawa tawa lon kipisi ma mun ni lon tenpo pini suli.  ona li pakala lon tenpo ni.

english: Your first job is to send over a skeleton crew, and establish basic power generation and life support.  I had the previous crew box up some of the usable equipment.  You should find the parts you need are already in storage.
translation: nanpa wan la o pana e kulupu lili jan.  ona li ken open e pana wawa e pana pi kon pona.  kulupu jan pi tenpo pini li poki e ilo pona.  ijo wile mute li lon poki.
o pana e jan tawa tomo pali
o pana e ilo wawa
o pana e nasin lupa pi kon pona
o kon e tomo [*X%]

english: We need to tidy up the mess, but nothing needs to be wasted.  We can recycle all of the raw materials found on this station.
translation: sina wile pona e pakala la ala o weka.  sina ken pona pi kepeken sin e ijo ale tan tomo ni.

english: There is an industrial smelter among the boxed equipment.  Install it and power it up, then set it to recycling all of the scrap metal.  This will give us an early supply of Metal Ingots.  A critical resource in manufacturing anything.
translation: kulupu poki la ilo kiwen seli li lon.  o pana e ona o wawa e ona.  ni la o lawa e ona tawa nasin ni: ona li sin e kiwen suno pakala ale.  ni li pana e kulupu open pi leko kiwen suno.  ni li ijo suli tawa nasin pali ale.
o pana e ilo kiwen seli
ilo kiwen seli o kepeken kiwen suno pakala
o weka e ilo pakala

english: Efficiency is going to be the key to this facility turning a profit.  Set up a storage zone for scrap metal near to your Smelter, and another for the Metal Ingots that come out.  Our crew will waste a lot less time carrying goods long distances.
translation: pona pi nasin pali li nasin mani pona.  o sitelen e ma awen pi kiwen suno pakala lon poka pi ilo kiwen seli.  o sitelen kin e ma awen pi leko kiwen suno kama tan ilo.  poka ala la jan li weka e tenpo mute tan pali pi tawa jo.

english: If I could draw your attention to this schematic issued by the Andromeda Project.  You can see it's actually quite a simple part.  This is just a structural framework, onto which they'll build everything else.
translation: o lukin e sitelen ilo Antometa ni.  pali ilo li ike ala.  ni li sijelo ilo taso.  pali ante ale kama li lon supa ni.

english: We can manufacture these parts in just two stages out of Metal Ingots.  I've left a boxed Fabricator and an Assembly Table on the station.  Set them up next to each other, ideally near to the Metal Ingots.
translation: sina ken pali e ijo kepeken nasin pi tenpo tu kepeken leko kiwen suno.  poki lon tomo la ilo pali en supa pali li lon.  o pana e ona lon poka sama.  pona kin la ona li lon poka pi leko kiwen suno.

english: Once they're installed, set the Fabricator to manufacture Frames, then set the Assembly Table to specialise them into finished Stargate Frames.  It's simple stuff, but eventually we will need a huge throughput.
translation: ilo li lon la o lawa e nasin pali pi ilo pali tawa sijelo ilo.  ni la o lawa e supa pali tawa sijelo ilo pi lupa mun.
o pana e ilo pali
o lawa e ilo pali tawa sijelo ilo
o pana e supa pali

english: Set Assembly Table to Stargate Frames
translation: o lawa e supa pali tawa sijelo ilo pi lupa mun

english: They want us to provide an initial batch of 10 Stargate Frames, for certification.  They'll inspect our work and we'll be approved as official partners in the Andromeda Project.
translation: open la ona li wile e ni: mi pali e sijelo ilo 10 pi lupa mun.  jan Antometa li wile sona e ni: mi pali pona ala pona?  ona li lukin pona e ijo tan pali mi.  ale li pona la, ona li kama e mi mute tawa kulupu pali Antometa.

english: It shouldn't take too long.  If you run out of metal, remember you can recycle more of the ruined equipment around the facility.
translation: tenpo pali li suli ala. kiwen suno li kama weka la o sona e ni: sina ken kepeken ilo pakala mute tan tomo.
o pali e sijelo ilo [*X/10] pi lupa mun
o pana e sijelo ilo 10 pi lupa mun

english: This is a message for A.J.E FOUNDRY.  We've received your samples and can report that they have passed comfortably within our engineering tolerances.  You are formally approved as licensed industry partners, and may now manufacture all items in our design manifest.
translation: toki ni li tawa TOMO PALI A.J.E.  mi jo e ijo pali open sina.  mi lukin pona e ona la ona li pona tawa lukin pi nasin ilo mi.  kama pona tawa kulupu pali.  tenpo ni la sina ken pali e ijo ale lon lipu mi pi nasin pali.

english: Thank you for your endeavours, and good luck.
translation: sina pona tan pali.  o pona.

english: Excellent.  Let's have a look at the Manifest that he mentioned, and see what is required next.
translation: pona mute.  o lukin e lipu pi nasin pali tan toki ona.  o lukin e pali wile kama poka.

english: It looks like it's just a bulk order of the part we already provided.  We need to make 200 more Stargate Frames.  We're already manufacturing them, but we'll need to scale up production or else this will take forever.
translation: lukin la ona li kulupu suli pi ijo sama.  sina wile pali e sijelo ilo 200 pi lupa mun.  sina pali e ona lon tenpo ni la sina wile suli e pali.  suli ala la pali li wile e tenpo pi suli ike.

english: I'm releasing some of the seed money to you.  $600,000 should be enough for you to buy all the equipment we need to scale up.  Remember this isn't a gift.  I still own this station, and all the equipment onboard.
translation: mi pana e mani open tawa sina.  mani $600,000 la sina ken esun e ilo wile ale pi kama suli.  o sona e ni: ni li mani sina ala.  mi awen jo e tomo ni e ilo ale.

english: I suggest you buy more Smelters, more Fabricators, and more Assembly Tables.  A couple of each at least.  All that equipment will draw more juice, so you'll need to expand the power network with more Reactors and Batteries to cope.  And you'll need more crew to do the work.
translation: mi pilin e ni: o esun e ilo kiwen seli mute, e ilo pali mute, e supa pali mute.  ale la tu anu mute.  ilo ni ale li wile e wawa mute la, sina wile suli kin e pana wawa.  o pana e ilo wawa mute e poki wawa mute tan wile ni.

english: If you run out of Metal Ingots, you should be able to buy raw materials from the open Marketplace.  You can usually buy more Scrap Metal, but you'll also find Metallic Minerals for sale which can also be smelted into Metal Ingots.
translation: leko kiwen suno li weka la sina ken esun e ijo tan tomo esun.  tenpo mute la sina ken esun e kiwen suno pakala.  kin la sina ken esun e kiwen pi kiwen suno.  sina ken pona e ni tawa leko kiwen suno kepeken ilo kiwen seli.
o suli e pali
o open pona seli e kiwen suno [*X/200]
o pali e sijelo ilo [*X/200] pi lupa mun
o esun e sijelo ilo [*X/200] pi lupa mun

english: I knew this would be a very profitable endeavour for us.  The Andromeda Project are so desperately in need of reliable manufacturing facilities that they're paying a fortune.
translation: tenpo pini la mi sona e ni: nasin ni li pana e mani mute tawa mi mute.  kulupu Antometa li wile wawa e tomo pali la ona li pana e mani mute.

english: Now, the sales revenue is going to flow through you.  But remember our agreement.  50/50.  I've put a lot of capital in to get us to this point, and I need to start seeing a return.
translation: tenpo ni la mani esun li kama tawa poki sina.  o weka sona ala e nasin: o tu 50/50 e mani.  kama tawa tenpo ni la mi pana e mani mute.  mi wile jo e mani kama tan ni.

english: Every time you sell a batch of parts to the Andromeda Project, you'll owe me half the revenue.  I'd appreciate it if you'd pay promptly.
translation: sina esun e ijo tawa kulupu Antometa la sina o tu e mani o pana e wan tawa mi.

english: The later phases of this project will no doubt be much more involved.  But we are perfectly positioned to capitalise on this opportunity.  And there is a lot of opportunity to be had.
translation: tawa pini la pali suli ni li wile e pali wawa.  taso mi lon nasin mani pona lon esun pali ni.  esun pali mute li lon.

english: There are individuals behind this mega-project with wealth and resources far beyond my comprehension.  But their ambitions far exceed the capabilities of the other ships and people in this sector.  They are going to need our help.
translation: jan lawa pi kulupu Antometa li jo e mani pi mute wawa nasa.  taso wile ona li suli tawa ken pi jan lon kipisi ma mun ni.  ona li kama wile e pona mi.

english: We can take a short break, and I'll give you a call when I'm ready to start work on the next phase of the stargate project. You might want to stop some of your equipment in the meantime, we don't want to waste anything!
translation: mi ken weka pali lon tenpo lili.  ken open pali sin pi lupa mun la mi toki tawa sina.
mi tawa!
kulupu pali wawa mun (kipisi 2)

english: Resume work on the Stargate with X
translation: o open sin e pali pi lupa mun kepeken X

english: Captain, I think it's time we resumed work on the Stargate contract.  I've had a look ahead and the next phase is a huge step up.  Give me a call when you're ready to continue work.
translation: jan lawa o, mi pilin e ni: o open sin e pali pi lupa mun.  mi lukin e kama la tenpo kama li suli mute tawa ijo pini.  ken open pali sin la o toki tawa mi.
o toki tawa X

english: However, nothing they're asking us to produce is impossible, and I have a strong personal interest in seeing this project completed.  The sooner the better.
translation: taso wile ale li ken.  mi wile wawa pini e pali ni.

english: The Andromeda Project have released specifications for three different components.  We need to manufacture large quantities of all three to complete this phase, and each will require a different industrial setup.
translation: kulupu pali Antometa li pana e nasin pali ante tu wan.  wile pini pi tenpo ni la mi wile pali e kulupu suli pi tu wan ni.  nasin pali ale li wile e nasin pali kulupu ilo ante.
o pali e ilo open pi lupa mun [*X/250]
o pali e ko pi lupa mun [*X/250]
o pali e lili pona pi tawa suli [*X/100]

english: Take control of the A.J.E Foundry
translation: o lawa e tomo pali wawa A.J.E
o lawa e tomo

english: I propose we expand and upgrade the Station into a mining facility.  If we install Engines we can move to a rich asteroid vein, then Mining Lasers and Logistics Drones will give us the capability to harvest the raw materials we need.
translation: mi pilin e ni: o suli o pona e tomo tawa tomo pali pi alasa kiwen.  mi pana e ilo pi wawa tawa la mi ken tawa kulupu pona pi kiwen mun.  ni la ilo alasa kiwen suno en ilo tawa ilo li pana e ken ni: mo kama jo e kiwen wile ale.

english: The Stargate Actuators are made on the Assembly Table as normal, and they require a Stargate Frame and a Motor. Motors can be made in fabricators.
translation: ilo open pi lupa mun li kama tan pali lon supa pali.  ona li wile e sijelo ilo pi lupa mun, e ilo pi tawa sike.  ilo pi tawa sike li kama tan ilo pali.

english: You'll need to mine Metallic Minerals and Copper Minerals, then melt those materials into ingots in an array of Smelters.  You can then fabricate the Motors and Frames, and finally assemble them into Stargate Actuators.
translation: sina wile alasa e kiwen pi kiwen suno e kiwen pi kiwen suno loje.  ni la o telo e kiwen ni tawa leko kepeken kulupu pi ilo kiwen seli.  ni la sina ken pali e ilo pi tawa sike e sijelo ilo.  pini la o wan e ona tawa ilo open pi lupa mun.

english: I'll release some more of the seed capital to cover the costs of the upgrade, but you can take care of the details.
translation: mi pana e mani mute tan wile pi kama suli.  taso sina o pali e ijo lili ale.
o pana e ilo alasa kiwen suno
o pana e ilo tawa ilo
o open alasa kiwen pi kiwen suno [*X/100]
o open alasa kiwen pi kiwen suno loje [*X/100]
o open pali e leko kiwen suno loje [*X/100]
o open pali e ilo pi tawa sike [*X/100]

english: The second part is a chemical compound they're calling Stargate Resin.  It's synthesised in a Chemical Lab, but we first need huge volumes of Metreon Gas.  It's found only in deep space nebulas.
translation: ijo wile nanpa tu li ko pi lupa mun.  ona li kama tan supa pali pi sona seli.  taso open la mi wile e kon Metejan mute.  ona li lon kon ko taso pi ma mun weka.

english: My thinking is to buy a suitable fuselage from a Shipyard, and then convert it into a dedicated gas capture and refining facility.  There's a good ship nearby.  You can buy it on my behalf and then set it up, and we'll drop it off in a rich gas cloud and leave it running.
translation: mi pilin e ni: o esun e tomo tawa tan ma pali pi tomo tawa.  o ante e ona tawa tomo pali ni: alasa kon Metejan en pali pona kon Metejan.  tomo tawa pona li lon poka.  sina ken esun e ona sama mi.  o open a nasin pali ona.  ni la mi pana e ona lon kon ko mun pona li awen pali e ona.
o esun e tomo tawa pi alasa kon

english: The final requirement is a few barrels of Stable Isotopes.  These are easily captured during routine FTL travel.  I think you can take care of this one yourself, but if necessary I can talk you through it.
translation: ijo wile pini li ni: lili pona pi tawa suli.  sina ken alasa e ni lon tawa suli nasin.  pilin mi la sina ken pali pona e ni kepeken sona lon.  taso wile la mi ken toki e nasin tawa sina.
o toki pi wile sona lon lili pona pi tawa suli

english: There is a ship for sale here that's perfect for our gas collection enterprise.  Let's buy it and add it to the fleet.
translation: sina ken esun e ilo tawa.  ona li pona tawa pali pi alasa kon.  o esun e ona tawa kulupu sina.

english: Gas collection is a slow process.  Our aim should be to place this vessel within a dense metreon nebula, slowly absorbing the gas and refining it over time.  Once we're in the nebula we won't be able to easily upgrade the ship, so we'll want to set it up as much as possible in advance.
translation: alasa kon li wile e tenpo suli.  wile li ni: o pana e tomo pali kon lon insa pi kon ko pona.  tenpo suli la ona li kama jo e kon li pona e kon.  tomo li lon ko la mi ken ala pona e ona lon nasin pona.  ni la mi wile pana e nasin pona lon tenpo open.

english: I'll send over more seed money and you can outfit the ship as you see best.
translation: mi pana e mani mute.  o pona e tomo pali kon lon nasin pona pi pilin sina.

english: The process of making Stargate Resin starts with a Gas Collector bringing in the Metreon Gas.  We then pipe that into a Refinery to produce Refined Metreon, then into a Chemical Lab where the Stargate Resin can be synthesised.
translation: ko pi lupa mun la nasin pali open kepeken alasa kon Metejan kepeken ilo alasa kon.  nasin lupa li ken tawa e ona tawa ilo pi pali pona.  ilo li pana e kon pona Metejan lon nasin lupa tawa supa pali pi sona seli.  supa ni la jan li ken pali e ko pi lupa mun.

english: You may need to shop around a bit, if the local trade post doesn't have everything you need.
translation: tomo esun poka li jo ala e ijo wile sine ale la sina ken wile tawa esun lili.

english: Once the ship is ready, pair it up with one of your FTL capable vessels, and jump into a nearby nebula to begin the process of gas collection.
translation: tomo pali tawa li ken pali la o kulupu e ona e ilo tawa pi tawa suli.  o tawa kon ko lon poka.  o open e pali pi alasa kon.

english: We need to produce 100 Stable Isotopes. This is a chemical compound we must synthesise and deliver in barrels to the Andromeda Project.
translation: mi wile pali e lili pona 100 pi tawa suli.  mi wile pana e poki ona tawa kulup Antometa.

english: It's not too complex.  It starts with a Hyperspace Scoop, or several ideally, that you can fit to your vessels.  Every time you make an FTL jump you'll collect more as you pass through deep space at light speed.  You can then pipe those isotopes into a Refinery and convert them into Stable Isotopes.
translation: pali li ike ala.  o open kepeken ilo alasa kiwen uta, anu mute lon pona.  o pana e ona tawa tomo tawa sina.  tawa suli ale la sina kama jo e kiwen mute pi tawa suli.
o pana e ilo alasa kiwen uta
o open alasa e lili [*X/100] pi tawa suli

english: Begin unloading barrels of Stable Isotopes [*X/10]
translation: o open pana e poki lili pona pi tawa suli [*X/10]

english: I'm sure you've noticed, we're making a small fortune from all of this.  Truth be told, I'm not really doing this for the revenue.  I already have more than I can ever spend.  But I'm running out of time.  The Doctors have made that clear to me.
translation: ken la sina sona e ni tan lukin: mani mute li kama tan pali ale ni.  lon la mi pali ala tan mani.  mi jo e mute pi ken kepeken ale ala.  taso mi jo ala e tenpo mute.  jan misikeke li toki e ni tawa mi.

english: I've been around quite a few years.  I've had my share of success, built my empire, my fortune.  I live a comfortable life.  But I find myself thinking more and more about what I want to do with the time I have left.
translation: mi awen lon tenpo mute.  tenpo pini la mi jo e kama pona, li pali e esun suli, li kama jo e mani mute.  mi jo e lon pona.  taso mute la mi toki insa lon ni: tenpo awen mi la mi wile pali e seme?

english: I just want to be the first at something huge.  The first person to visit another galaxy.  Alexander James Elistar.  That's a name that people would remember.
translation: mi wile e ni: mi jan pali nanpa wan pi ijo suli.  jan tawa nanpa wan tawa kulupu suno suli ante.  jan Alesantejemelisa.  jan li ken awen sona e nimi ni.

english: Let's take another break and I'll contact you when the Andromeda Project releases the manifest for their next phase.
translation: o weka pali lon tenpo lili.  kulupu Antometa li pana e nasin pali sin pi tenpo kama la mi toki tawa sina.

english: There's a situation brewing at our factory in the asteroid belt.  You'd better take a look.
translation: ijo li open lon tomo pali mi lon kulupu kiwen mun.  o lukin.

english: Is he in there?  Alexander?  Where is he?
translation: ona li lon ma ni anu seme?  jan Alesantejemelisa?  ona li lon ma seme?

english: I'm not going to ask again.  I demand to speak to Alexander Elistar.  Immediately!  I am armed!
translation: mi toki wile ala lon tenpo namako.  mi wile toki tawa jan Alesantejemelisa.  lon tenpo ni!
mi toki tawa ona.

english: Raymond.  It's been quite a while.  How have you been?
translation: jan Wemon o.  tenpo pini mute.  sina pona ala pona?

english: How have I been?  You know exactly how I've been.  I'm here to collect my share.
translation: mi pona ala pona?  sina sona e pona mi.  mi wile e kipisi mi.

english: Captain, I'll take care of this.  My private security are on their way.  I'll keep him talking, but there's no need for bloodshed.
translation: jan lawa o, mi ken lawa e ni.  jan awen mi li kama.  mi awen toki kepeken ona la wile utala li lon ala.

english: The designs were mine.  The patents were mine!  All of this, it's all built on my work.
translation: nasin pali li tan mi.  lon lawa!  ni ale li kama tan pali mi.

english: You were compensated for your work Raymond.  You signed the contract.
translation: mi esun e pali sina, jan Wemon o.  sina sitelen e lipu pi nasin esun pali.

english: For pennies!  You screwed me, and now it's worth millions!
translation: mani lili!  sina pakala esun e mi.  tenpo ni la mani li mute!

english: I want my share.  Deal me in.  10% ownership of this new venture of yours.  I'm being reasonable, but the law is on my side.  Don't make me shut you down Alexander.
translation: mi wile e kipisi mi.  o pana tawa mi.  mi wile e kipisi 10% tan pali sin sina.  mi pona la lawa li pilin sama nasin mi.

english: This is Private Security vessel DOGMA, under exclusive contract to A.J.E Industries.
translation: ni li tomo tawa DOGMA pi utala awen.  mi pali tan esun pi kulupu pali A.J.E.

english: You are operating in a dangerous and threatening manner in the vicinity of an A.J.E corporate facility.
translation: sina pali pi ken pakala lon poka pi tomo esun A.J.E.

english: You are ordered to stand down and withdraw immediately.
translation: o weka utala o tawa weka lon tenpo ni.

english: We are authorised by deep space convention in the use of deadly force in defense of our client's assets.
translation: pakala li kama tawa mani pi jan lawa mi la, lawa la mi ken kepeken nasin utala pi ken moli.

english: THERE WILL BE NO FURTHER WARNING.

sina pana e ken ante ala tawa mi.

english: I'll be coming for you Alexander, and this time I'm not asking for 10%. I want it all.

translation: ILO TAWA li pali! tenpo ni la ilo li pana e wawa tawa tomo.

english: Unfortunately it seems pirates have gotten to them first, and have set up their own shipyards around the neubidium deposits in the system.
translation: ike la jan ike lanpan li kama lon tenpo pini. ona li jo e ma pali pi ilo tawa lon poka pi kiwen Nupisijan.

english: Thank you Captain! We would never have survived without your assistance.
translation: jan lawa o sina pona a! pona sina ala la mi awen ala.

english: We'd be honoured to join forces with your fleet.
translation: mi wile pona kulupu kepeken sina.

english: Investigate a distress call in system *X.
translation: o alasa e toki pi wile pona lon kulupu sike *X.
jan lawa o wile e pona

english: There is a crisis underway Captain.  Commercial vessels are going missing, all across the sector.  I suspect foul play, and I need your help to investigate.
translation: jan lawa o, pakala li lon. ilo tawa esun mute li tawa weka lon kipisi ma mun ni. pilin mi la, ni li tan pali pi jan ike. o pona e lukin mi.

english: I've marked the location of the shipwreck on your map as a Gold Highlight.  Good luck Captain.
translation: mi suno jelo e pakala lon sitelen ma mun sina. o alasa pona.

english: Complete Phase 2 of the Stargate to unlock
translation: wile open la o pini e tenpo nanpa tu pi lupa mun

english: Due to new storylines surrounding the stargate, your stargate progress has been reset.
translation: nasin toki sin pi lupa mun la, pali sina pi lupa mun li tawa weka.

english: Add scaffolding to support equipment on the exterior of your ship
translation: wile kepeken ilo pi insa tomo ala la o pali e palisa sijelo ilo

english: Unlocks Phases 4, 5, and 6 of the Andromeda Project.
translation: pali suli Antometa la, kipisi nanpa tu tu en kipsi nanpa luka en kipisi nanpa luka wan la, ni li open e nasin pali.

english: The damaged ship is nearby in system *X. Hurry!
translation: ilo tawa pakala li lon kulupu sike *X. ni li poka la o tawa wawa a!

english: The hostile ships are located at system *X.
translation: ilo tawa ike li lon kulupu sike *X.

english: Luckily there is just such an asteroid belt nearby, within this sector, in system *X.
translation: pona la, kulupu kiwen mun Silija li lon poka lon kipisi ma ni, lon kulupu sike *X.

english: You have destroyed the enemy forces in system *X. Payment of $*Y is coming your way.
translation: sina moli e jan ike lon kulupu sike *X. mani $*Y li kama.

english: Investigate a distress call in system *X.
translation: o alasa e toki pi wile pona lon kulupu sike *X.

english: The ships main source of forward thrust.  Must be supplied with Fuel (via a pipe) and Power (via a cable).
translation: ni li tawa sinpin e ilo tawa, li wile e telo wawa (kepeken nasin lupa) e wawa (kepeken linja wawa).

english: Engines for propulsion.  Test fire your engines (From the TACTICAL view) to certify them.
translation: ilo pi wawa tawa li tawa e ilo tawa.  o kepeken pi tenpo nanpa wan e ilo pi wawa tawa (lon sitelen pi NASIN UTALA).  ni li pana e sona ni: ona li ken.

english: Excellent. We are sending a shuttle to you now.
translation: pona mute. mi pana e poki tawa tawa sina lon tenpo ni.

english: Provide enough power to the stargate with energy transmitters to complete the testfire! Each transmitter beams up to 100MW to the stargate
translation: wile pini pi kepeken lupa nanpa wan la, mute pona la o pana e ilo pi pana wawa tawa lupa mun. ilo wan li pana e wawa 100MW tawa lupa.

english:
Lets turn our attention to the STARGATE PROJECT.

We can view our progress from the Stargate screen.

Open the STARGATE screen.
translation:
o lukin e PALI SULI PI LUPA MUN.

sina ken lukin e mute pini pi pali ni kepeken lipu pi lupa mun.

o open e lipu pi LUPA MUN.

english: Click on the nearby RUINED EQUIPMENT to instruct your crew to dismantle it into SCRAP.
translation: o luka e ILO PAKALA. ni li toki e ni tawa jan sina: o pakala e ni tawa KIWEN SUNO PAKALA.

english: The ship is fitted with engines and an FTL drive for Interstellar Travel! But it does need a crew.\n\nOpen the TRADE SCREEN.
translation: ilo tawa ni li jo e ilo pi wawa tawa e ilo pi tawa suli! taso ona li wile e jan.\n\no open e lipu ESUN.

english: Many different types of contract are now available to you.\n\nHowever, you must stay alert Captain. There are reports of even more lucrative opportunities that you'll have to find by yourself.
translation: pali esun pi nasin mute li ken\n\ntaso o lukin pona lon tenpo ale. toki la alasa li ken pana e pali esun pi mani mute.

english: We are now going to learn some basic combat techniques.
translation: tenpo ni la o kama sona e nasin utala open.

english: Well done, you have produced Refined Tilium.
translation: sina pona. sina pali e KIWEN MANI SILIJA

english: They're sending the recovered wreckage to your ship The L*X now Captain. It will arrive soon by Shuttle. You'll need to store it somewhere onboard.
translation: jan lawa o, ona li pana e pakala tawa tomo tawa L*X sina lon tenpo ni. ona li kama lon poki tawa. sina wile awen e ona lon insa pi tomo tawa sina.

english: Standby while I dock my ship with yours Captain, to collect the items you've recovered so far. Thank you for your efforts.
translation: o awen la mi poka lupa e tomo tawa mi tawa sina, jan lawa o. mi kama jo e ijo tan alasa sina. sina pona tan pali alasa.

english: We need to find a way to track them down, and destroy them.  We will be in touch soon Captain.
translation: mi wile alasa e ona. mi wile moli e ona.  mi toki lon tenpo kama poka, jan lawa o.

english: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing, Part 2
translation: soweli utala li len sama soweli moku la, kipisi nanpa 2
jan lawa o sina pona tan kama.

english: The Reactor is reaching critical levels Captain.  I can't stop it from overloading.
translation: jan lawa o, ilo wawa li kama pakala. mi ken ala weka e kama pi pakala seli.

english: Well done Captain.  Your intervention prevented a further loss of life.  And now we know the pirate vessel is crewed by cowards, a fact that we intend to use to our advantage.
translation: jan lawa o sina pali pona.  pali sina li weka e kama moli.  tenpo ni la mi sona e ni: jan ike lanpan li pilin monsuta.  mi ken kepeken pona e sona ni.

english: I appreciate your speed in rescuing the crew of the Orion Sentinel Captain.
translation: jan lawa o, sina kama pona e jan tan tomo tawa Orion Sentinel.  sina pona tan tenpo lili pi pali ni.

english: Thank you Captain.  Protect your fleet, and wait for our call.
translation: jan lawa o, sina pona.  o awen e kulupu sina.  o awen tan toki mi lon tenpo kama.

english: For years now my brother and I have been studying the high energy particle emissions in orbit of the black hole you can see behind us.  Its official designation is Qz 247 - the collapsed remnants of a star that lived a couple of billion years ago.
translation: sike suno mute la mi en jan sama mi li pali sona e tawa wawa pi ilo lili lon sike selo pi lupa pimeja ni.  sina ken lukin e lupa lon monsi mi.  nimi ona li lupa pimeja Qz 247.  ona li kama tan pakala suno lon tenpo pi pini mute.

english: Thank you for offering your services Captain.
translation: sina pona tan wile pali pona, jan lawa o

english: I'm sending a shuttle to you now Captain. Get your crew to load the Hyperspace Isotopes for me.
translation: mi pana e poki tawa tawa sina lon tenpo ni, jan lawa o.  jan pali sina o tawa e lili.

english: Thank you Captain. I now have what I need to modify this FTL drive for the Short Range Hop.
translation: sina pona, jan lawa o.  tenpo ni la mi wile ante pi tawa lili e ilo ni pi tawa suli.

english: It looks like you have enough Tilium Crystals.  Bring the tilium crystals back to me to close the contract.
translation: lukin la sina jo e kiwen mani Silija pi mute pona.  o kama e kiwen tawa mi la pali esun li pini.

english: I'll send the shuttle to collect the tilium crystals. Thank you captain!
translation: mi pana e poki tawa.  ona li kama e kiwen mani Silija tawa mi.  jan lawa o sina pona!

english: Excellent work Captain.  I'll begin synthesising the FTL charges immediately.  It will take me a little while.
translation: pali pi pona mute, jan lawa o.  tenpo ni la mi open pali e wawa pi tawa suli lili.

english: Greetings Captain.  I'm a representative of the Stargate Project.
translation: jan lawa o, toki.  mi jan tan kulupu pali pi lupa mun.

english: When the accident occurred, the younger twin Marcus was collecting vital data on black hole Qz 247.  Data that is simply impossible to acquire by any other means.  Data that we need to complete the Stargate.
translation: tenpo pakala la jan Makumasine li alasa e sona suli tan lupa pimeja Qz 247.  mi ken ala kama jo e sona ni kepeken nasin ante.  pini pali pi lupa mun li wile e sona ni.

english: Everything is ready Captain.  I've produced the Hyperspace Modulators and the FTL fuel is already loaded.
translation: jan lawa o, pali li ken open.  pini la mi pali e kipisi ilo nasa pi kama ante.  wawa pi tawa suli lili li lon tomo wile lon tenpo ni.

english: This has been a long time coming Captain.  I've been working on this rescue for years.  Time dilation effects from the Black Hole mean that only a few hours will have passed for my brother.  It will be a surprise to him just how much time has passed when you bring him out.
translation: pona ni li kama tan tenpo suli, jan lawa o. mi lukin kama pona e jan sama mi lon tenpo mute pi sike suno.  nasa tenpo pi lupa pimeja la tenpo lili taso li weka tawa jan sama.  ona li kama weka tan lupa la ni li kama pilin nasa tawa ona: tenpo mute li weka.

english: Let's run over the plan one last time.  You're going to perform an incredibly short range Hyperspace Hop, and you'll emerge directly on top of my Brother's ship.  Dock with his ship, rescue him and then get out of there.  Hop in, Rescue, Hop out.
translation: mi o toki lon pali kama lon tenpo wan namako.  sina kama tawa suli pi lili lili.  ni la sina lon poka tomo tawa pi jan sama mi.  o poka lupa e ona o kama pona e jan o tawa weka.  tawa kama en kama pona jan en tawa weka.

english: Good luck Captain. I'll see you on the other side.
translation: o pona, jan lawa o.  mi lukin e sina lon pini.

english: Greetings Captain.  Good luck with the rescue.  Remember the data onboard Marcus' ship is extremely valuable to us.  You'll need Marcus to transmit the data from his console before you can complete the rescue.
translation: jan lawa o, toki.  kama pona jan la o pona.  o sona e ni: sona lon tomo tawa pi jan Makumasine li suli tawa mi mute.  kama pona jan li pini ala la tenpo ni la jan Makumasine li wile pana e sona tan ilo lon tomo tawa ona.

english: Dock your ship with mine Captain, and tell me when you're ready for me to come on board.  Please hurry!
translation: o poka lupa e tomo tawa sina tawa tomo tawa mi, jan lawa o.  mi ken kama tawa tomo sina la tenpo ni la o toki.  o tawa wawa!

english: The Stargate data?  I can send that Captain, but you'll have to give me a few minutes to access the data and set up the transmission.
translation: sona pi lupa mun, anu seme?  mi ken pana e ona, jan lawa o.  taso pali pi pana sona toki li wile e tenpo lili.

english: My ship is falling apart from the gravitional forces Captain.  I've sent the data that I can.  Please hurry and get me off this ship!
translation: tomo tawa mi li kama pakala lon tenpo ni, jan lawa o.  tenpo pini la mi pana e sona ale pi ken mi.  pona la o kama pona e mi tan tomo pakala lon tenpo ni!

english: The reactor containment has failed Captain.  The cabin is being flooded with radiation.  You have to get me out of here!
translation: selo pi ilo wawa li pakala, jan lawa o.  wawa ike kon li kama tawa tomo.  o kama a e mi tan tomo ni!

english: I'm onboard Captain.  Get us out of here!
translation: mi lon tomo sina, jan lawa o.  o tawa weka e mi mute a!

english: Thank you so much Captain. I couldn't have succeeded without your help. I'm so grateful you took my call and were here for us when we needed you.
translation: sina pona mute, jan lawa o.  pona sina ala la mi ken ala pini pona.  mi pilin pona mute tan ni: mi toki pi wile pona la, sina kama.

english: We're really disappointed in your choices Captain.  You've let us down and you've let the whole Stargate Project down, with your incredibly narrow thinking.
translation: sina pali ike, jan lawa o.  sina pakala tawa jan pali ale pi lupa mun.  lawa sina li ike.

english: Well done on retrieving some of the data Captain.  We would have preferred all of it, but we appreciate the rescue was under extreme duress.
translation: kama jo sona meso la sina pona, jan lawa o.  tenpo pini la mi wile e sona pi mute suli la, sona pi mute meso li pona tan tenpo pi pakala suli.

english: Congratulations Captain on successfully recovering the science data from the stricken vessel.  This data represents a huge step forward in our understanding of high energy physics, and will hugely accelerate the Stargate Program.
translation: jan lawa o, sina pona tan ni: sina kama e sona mute tan ilo tawa pakala.  sona ni li pona mute e sona pi wawa nasa.  ni li pona mute e pali pi lupa mun.

english: Congratulations Captain. Your performance in the destruction of the Pirate Vessel exceeded all expectations!
translation: sina pona, jan lawa o.  moli pi jan ike lanpan la pali sina li pona wawa!

english: Farewell Captain. Your dedication to justice and the safety of our sector will be remembered.
translation: jan lawa o tawa pona.  tenpo kama ale la mi sona e ni: sina pana e pona awen mute tawa kipisi ma mun ni.

english: Are you kidding me! They've. . . They've reproduced! We've just witnessed an interstellar life form, spontaneously reproducing!
translation: nasa a! ona... ona li pana mama! mi lukin e ni: soweli mun li pana mama!

english: Incredible work Captain. I can't believe how much we've seen, in such a short period of time.
translation: pona mute, jan lawa o.  sona sin nasa mute li kama tan tenpo lili.

english: These findings will make an incredible research paper Captain.  I'll be sure to credit you as the pilot who found the first living specimens.  I would offer to name the creatures after you, but they already have a name, so apologies for not being able to honour that tradition.
translation: sona sin ni la mi sitelen e lipu sona pi pona mute, jan lawa o.  mi sitelen e ni: sina jan nanpa wan pi ilo tawa li alasa pona e soweli Sipa nanpa wan pi moli ala.  soweli li jo ala e nimi la sina ken pana e nimi.  nimi Sipa li lon la, ike la mi ken ala.

english: Anyway, thank you for your work Captain. Here's a reward for your efforts.
translation: sina pona tan pali, jan lawa o.  mi pana e pona ni tawa sina.

english: Welcome back Captain! I must say, the corridors at the Institute have been alive with excitement over this wondrous new lifeform. My paper has already been provisionally accepted into all the top nature journals, which makes me so proud.
translation: kama sin pona, jan lawa o! mi pilin e ni: pilin pi tomo sona li wawa pona tan sona pi soweli mun nasa sin ni.  lipu sona mi li tawa jan sona mute la mi pilin pona.

english: We need you to take the tiddlets on a series of specific hyperspace jumps. We will be recording the effect on their reproductive process and on their physiology. All. . . well, most of these experiments can be done hopefully without any harm coming to the creatures.
translation: mi wile e ni: mi pana e kulupu pi nasin mun tawa sina. sina tawa suli lon nasin ni. mi lukin e ni: seme li kama lon nasin unpa soweli lon sijelo soweli?  ale... n, mute la kama sona li pakala ala e soweli.

english: But with your permission, we can begin. Install the new sensors first Captain. And be sure to stock up on FTL fuel if you need to. Three or four jumps ought to be enough.
translation: taso sina wile la, mi ken open. open la o pana e ilo lukin sin tawa tomo sina, jan lawa o. o pona: mute pona la o jo e wawa pi tawa suli.  nasin li tawa suli tu wan anu tu tu.

english: *X Tiddlets so far.  This is all working very well Captain.  Now onto the real science.
translation: tenpo ni la soweli Sipa *X.  nasin li pona, jan lawa o.

english: *X Tiddlets now on board!  Fascinating Captain.  It appears the Tiddlet reproductive process occurs even at incredibly short hyperspace distances.\nHow do they find the time?
translation: soweli Sipa *X li lon tomo!  nasa pona, jan lawa o.  lukin la nasin unpa Sipa li kama kin lon tawa suli pi lili mute.\nona li jo e tenpo unpa tan seme?

english: That's such a horrible thing to witness.\nWe can't allow this sort of experiment to be done again Dr. It's so unethical.
translation: lukin ike a.\npali sona ni li ken ala lon tenpo kama, jan sona o. ni li nasin ike.

english: There's something else.  There's a reading showing up on the sensors, deep inside the core of the dead tiddlets.\nBring them all back to me Captain. I think we've done enough for today.
translation: kin.  ilo lukin li lukin e ijo lon insa pi soweli Sipa moli.\no kama e ona ale tawa mi, jan lawa o. mi pilin e ni: mi pali pi pona mute lon tenpo suno no.
sina pona, jan lawa o!

english: The work continues Captain. There is so much more to these Tiddlets than we realised.
translation: pali sona li awen, jan lawa o. soweli Sipa li len e sona mute.

english: I don't think I had the chance to properly thank you Captain. You risked your life for us.  And now my twin is ten years older than me! It's taken some getting used to.
translation: pilin mi la mi weka toki e ijo suli ni: sina pona mute, jan lawa o.  wile pona mi la sina tawa lon nasin pi ken moli.  tenpo ni la jan sama mi li jo e tenpo 10 namako pi sike suno tawa mi!  ona li nasa.

english: I've put the rescue ship up for sale. I was asking $1M, but you can have it for half that price if you like.  Thank you Captain.  You'll always be welcome with us.
translation: mi esun e ilo tawa pi kama pona jan.  mi wile e mani $1M la, sina wile la mi ken tu e mani.  sina pona, jan lawa o.  kama sina li pona tawa mi lon tenpo ale.

english: Incredible work Captain. I'm not sure how you managed that, but I'm true to my word.  I'll wire the funds to Dr. Martinez, with a sales bonus of $100k for you.  Bring the ship back to the Institute, and let's put it to use.
translation: pali pi pona wawa, jan lawa o.  mi sona ala e nasin sina la mi pana sama toki mi.  mi pana e mani tawa jan sona Julijanmasine.  mi pana e mani namako $100k tawa sina.  o kama e ilo tawa tawa tomo sona.  mi o kepeken ona.

english: Hello Captain.  How have you been? Things have been tough here.
translation: jan lawa o, toki.  sina pona ala pona?  ike li lon ma ni.

english: I hope it was worth it for you Captain.
translation: mi wile e ni: pona mute sina li kama tan pakala ni, jan lawa o.

english: Good work Captain. That's a good price.  I'll send the funds to Dr Martinez.  You've earned a sales bonus of $40k.  Bring the ship back to the Institute, and let's put it to use.
translation: pali pona, jan lawa o.  mani esun li lili pona.  mi pana e mani tawa jan sona Julijanmasine.  sina kama jo e mani namako $40k.  o kama e ilo tawa tawa tomo sona la mi kepeken.

english: I don't want to talk to you Captain.  Yes, the ship is for sale.  Take it.  I don't ever want to see that ship, or you, again.  Do not call me again.
translation: mi wile ala toki tawa sina, jan lawa o. lon la, mi esun e ilo tawa.  o esun e ona.  mi wile ala a lukin e sina e ilo ni lon tenpo kama ale.  o toki ala tawa mi.

english: Excellent.  It's working, as I knew it would.  Give us three more hops Captain.
translation: pona mute.  pona li kama sama toki mi.  o tawa lon tenpo tu wan kin, jan lawa o.

english: Dismantle the Hop Drive Captain, and I'll send a shuttle to collect it.  I want you to replace the Hop Drive with a conventional FTL drive, for the final part of the experiment.  I'll send a replacement FTL drive in the delivery shuttle.
translation: jan lawa o tu e ilo pi tawa suli lili.  mi kama e ona tawa mi kepeken poki tawa.  tu pini pin pali sona la mi wile e ni: sina weka e ilo pi tawa suli lili, li kepeken ilo pi tawa suli nasin.  mi pana e ilo nasin lon poki tawa sama.

english: You know what to do Captain.  A couple of very long jumps ought to be enough.  Bring them all back to me when it's done.
translation: sina sona e nasin pona, jan lawa o.  tawa suli suli tu li ken pona.  pini la o kama e ale tawa mi.

english: Well done Captain.  Everything has worked exactly as I predicted, and we now have an excellent harvest on the farm ship.  More importantly, you've shown the way.
translation: pali pona, jan lawa o.  ale li kama sama toki mi.  tenpo ni la mi jo e pona mute lon tomo mama Sipa.  suli ale la sina pana suno e nasin.

english: I think I can take it from here Captain.  My engineers tell me they'll have the Hop Drive fitted to the farm ship in just a few days.  In fact, we are close to automating the entire Tiddlet Harvest process with this one ship.
translation: mi pilin e ni: mi ken pini e pali lon tenpo ni, jan lawa o.  jan pali mi li toki e ni tawa mi: tenpo kama poka la ona li pini pana e ilo pi tawa suli lili lon tomo mama Sipa.  ni li wile taso e tenpo suno pi nanpa lili.  lon la, poka la mi lawa ilo e nasin mama Sipa ale kepeken ilo tawa wan taso.

english: I knew we could rely on you Captain.  Thank you for showing the highest degrees of professionalism.
translation: sina pali pona, jan lawa o.  sina jan pali pi nasin pona nanpa wan.

english: Mark my words Captain.  You will bitterly regret crossing me.
translation: o kute pona e toki me, jan lawa o.  sina kama pilin ike tan ni: sina pakala e mi.

english: I'll be in touch if I need your help Captain.
translation: wile pona sin la mi toki lon tenpo kama, jan lawa o.

english: You have to help us Captain.
translation: o pona e mi, jan lawa o.

english: Oh god...they're in the food stuffs!
translation: sewi a... ona li lon poki moku!

english: Oh god...they're in the air-conditioning system!
translation: sewi a... ona li lon nasin lupa pi kon pona!

english: Oh god...they're in the reactor room!
translation: sewi a... ona li lon tomo pi ilo wawa!

english: I want to thank you for helping Captain, when it counted. For doing the right thing. I'll split the remaining grant money I have with you. You deserve it.
translation: sina pona, jan lawa o.  sina pali pona lon tenpo suli.  pona sina la mi tu e mani li pana e kipisi tawa sina.  o jo.

english: But I'd recommend you never bring a third aboard.  Look after them Captain. I know you will.
translation: taso o kama ala e soweli Sipa nanpa tu wan tawa tomo sina.  o pona e ona, jan lawa o.  mi sona e ni: sina kama pona e ona.

english: I suggest you look after them from now on Captain. It won't atone for the things you've done, but it's a start.
translation: o awen pona e soweli tan tenpo ni tawa tenpi kama, jan lawa o.  ni li pona ala e pali ike pi tenpo pini la, ona li open pona taso.

english: I suspect foul play here Captain. There's no way a ship like the Celestial Hammer would just vanish. Something must have happened, and I'm assuming the worst.
translation: mi pilin e ni: jan li pali e ike lon ni, jan lawa o.  nasin ala la ilo tawa Celestial Hammer li tawa weka tan ala.  ike li kama.  pilin mi la, ike suli.

english: I have to know what happened Captain.
translation: mi wile sona e nasin pakala, jan lawa o.

english: Right-clicking on equipment allows you to set recipes. Set the smelter recipe to scrap metal.
translation: sina luka ante e ilo la sina ken lawa e nasin pali.  o lawa e nasin pali ni tawa ilo kiwen seli: kiwen suno pakala.

english: Thank you Captain.  I appreciate the prompt payment.
translation: sina pona, jan lawa o.  kama mani pi tenpo lili li pona tawa mi.
kama mani li pini pona.  sina pona, jan lawa o.

english: I've received my share.  Excellent work Captain.
translation: mi jo e kipisi mani mi.  pali pona, jan lawa o.

english: Batches of completed parts may now be submitted to the Andromeda Project through the open marketplace. You will find our buyers ready to release funds for any parts manufactured to specification.
translation: sina ken pana e kulupu pi ijo pini tawa kulupu Antometa kepeken tomo esun.  jan esun li wile pana e mani tan ijo wile pini pona ale.

english: Fantastic work Captain.  I had high expectations, but the process was even more smooth than I hoped.  We've made ourselves known to the Andromeda Project now, but this is just the beginning.
translation: pali pona, jan lawa o.  mi pilin pona la nasin li pona mute.  kulupu Antometa li sona e mi lon tenpo ni.  taso ni li tenpo open taso.

english: Welcome back Captain.  I've been taking a look at the schematics published by the Andromeda Project, and the next phase is going to need a huge upgrade to our facilities.
translation: kama sin pona, jan lawa o.  mi lukin e sitelen Antometa pi nasin pali.  tenpo kama li wile e kama suli wawa lon tomo pali.

english: The first part is a Stargate Actuator.  This is something we can manufacture in our existing factory station, although it's a more complex production chain.  There won't be nearly enough resources available in the marketplace, so we'll have to mine the local belt for minerals.
translation: nanpa wan li ilo open pi lupa mun.  mi ken pali e ni kepeken kulupu ilo lon.  taso nasin li ike mute.  esun li jo ala e ijo mute la mi wile alasa kiwen lon kulupu kiwen mun poka.

english: One last thing Captain.  I'm sure you've noticed, we aren't exactly surrounded by asteroids here.  I suggest you pair the station up with one of your FTL capable vessels, and jump them both to a suitable mining location.  You can leave the station there to do its work.
translation: ijo pini wan taso, jan lawa o.  ken la sina sona tan lukin: kiwen mun li weka mute lon poka.  mi pilin e ni: o kulupu e tomo pali e ilo tawa pi tawa suli.  o tawa suli e kulupu tawa ma pona pi alasa kiwen.  o awen e tomo pali lon ma ni tan pali ona.

english: Time is now of the essence Captain.  All three parts need to be produced, and I'm in more of a hurry than you may realise.  Keep me informed!
translation: pona tenpo li suli, jan lawa o.  ijo wile tu wan ale li wile pali.  sina sona ala sona la mi jo ala e tenpo mute.  o pana e sona tawa mi lon nasin pali!

english: You'll need all of that equipment to get started.  I'd recommend Collectors, Refineries, and Factories, four each at least.  You'll also want Storage Tanks to buffer the intermediate products, and an upgrade to the Power Grid.
translation: wile open pali la sina wile e ilo ni ale.  mi pilin e ni: tu tu anu mute la o jo e ilo alasa kon, e ilo pi pali pona, e ilo pali.  kin la o jo e poki lon nasin, e kama suli pi pana wawa.

english: The final stage is to install a Loader or two, and set them to 'UNLOAD'.  This will instruct your crew to barrel up the stable isotopes and store them in the cargo hold so you can easily sell them on the marketplace.
translation: nasin pali la pini li ni: wan anu tu la o pana e ilo tawa moku wawa.  o lawa e ilo tawa nasin 'WEKA'.  ni la jan li poki e kiwen awen pi tawa suli.  jan li pana e poki tawa ma awen lon tomo jo.  ni la sina ken esun e ona lon tomo esun.

english: Excellent work Captain.  On time and to specification, as usual.  The Andromeda Project have enough of that item now, so you may as well stop production and save the energy and materials.
translation: pali pona, jan lawa o.  pona tenpo en pona pi nasin pali.  kulupu Antometa li jo e mute pona pi ijo ni lon tenpo ni la, o pini e pali ni.  sina wile ala weka ike e wawa e ijo.

english: We are all done Captain.  That was an incredible display of industrialised power.  There's nobody even close to us in the marketplace, and we basically are the Andromeda Project.  They need us now.
translation: pini, jan lawa o.  sina pana lukin e pali wawa.  jan pali ala li lon poka lon esun ale.  suli la kulupu pali Antometa li kulupu mi.  ona li wile e mi lon tenpo ni.

english: You should know that my Doctors continue to bring me bad news.  Each time I talk to them...well, I don't know how long I have left.  This will be my final project.  I just hope I have time to finish it.
translation: o sona e ni: awen la jan misikeke li toki e pakala sijelo kama tawa mi.  ni li pali pini mi.  mi wile taso e ni: mi jo e tenpo pi ken pini.
